paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tEH ca prakAra antara vRttiBiH pravRtti vijQAnEH vAsitAt vipAka vijQAnAt punar api Alambana apekzANi kuSala akuSala Adi prakAra antara vRttIni
# rgya gar skad du: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang dus rnam pa gzhan du 'jug pa de dag gis bsras [?] pa rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa las yang dmigs pa la ltos pa dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa gzhan du 'jug pa 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams 'byung bar gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatas ca vipAka vijQAnam sarva saMskRta Darma bIja anugatam pravRtti vijQAneByaH anyat iti sidDam
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams las rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon dang ldan pa gzhan yin par grub pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Cinna punar vRtti tAm ca upAdAya Alaya vijQAnam pravRtti vijQAneByaH anyat asti iti pratipattavyam
# rgya gar skad du: chad nas 'byung ba'i phyir 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams las kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gzhan yin par khong du chud par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: acittakam idDa mUrCA Adi avasTAsu cCinne pravRtti vijQAna santAne punar acittakam idDa mUrCA apagataH Alaya vijQAnam antareNa pravRtti vijQAn
# rgya gar skad du: sems med pa'i gnyid kyis log pa dang brgyal ba la sogs pa 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa rgyun chad pa las yang sems med pa'i nyid kyis log pa dang brgyal ba las sangs pa na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med pa'i 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung bar mi rung ngo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: niroDa samApatti Adi vyutTAna citta vat iha api vicAraH kartavyaH
# rgya gar skad du: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba'i sems dang 'dra bar 'dir yang dpyad par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: saMsAra pravRtti nivRtti tAm ca upAdAya pravRtti vijQAnAt anyat [p. 102] AlayavijQAnam yad nimittA saMsAra pravRttiH nivRttiH ca gamyat
# rgya gar skad du: 'khor bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gang gi rgyu las byung ba'i 'khor bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa yod pas 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa las kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gzhan yin par shes so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kzaNa avasTAnikAyasa BAga nErantarya prabanDena upAdAna skanDa utpAdaH saMsAraH iti ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: skad cig kyang mi gnas par ris mthun pa rgyun mi 'chad ba'i rgyun gyi nye bar len pa'i phung po 'byung ba ni 'khor ba zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasya punar pravRttiH nikAya sa BAga antarezu pratisanDiH
# rgya gar skad du: de'i 'jug pa ni ris mthun pa gzhan dag tu nying mtshams sbyor ba'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: nivRttiH sa upaDi SezaH nirupaDi SezaH ca nirvANa DAtuH
# rgya gar skad du: ldog pa ni phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra Alaya vijQAna anaByupagame saMskAra pratyaya vijQAna aBAvAt saMsAra pravRttiH na yujyate
# rgya gar skad du: de la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa khas mi len na 'du byed kyi rgyu rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba med pa'i phyir 'khor bar 'jug bar mi rung ngo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Alaya vijQAna anaByupagame hi pratisanDi vijQAnam vA saMskAra pratyayam parikalpyeta
# rgya gar skad du: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa khas mi len na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes 'byung ba nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: saMskAra pariBAvitAH vA zaz vijQAna kAyAH saMskAra pratyayam vijQAnam
# rgya gar skad du: 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug 'du byed kyi rkyen las byung bar brtag grang na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra na pratisanDi vijQAnam pUrva janma upacita saMskAra pratyayam
# rgya gar skad du: de'i tshe nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa ni tshe snga ma la bsags pa'i 'du byed kyi rkyen las byung ba ma yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pUrva janma upacita saMskArANAm cira nirudDa tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: tshe snga ma la bsags pa'i 'du byed ni 'gags nas ring du lon pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: nirudDasya ca asattvAt
# rgya gar skad du: 'gags pa ni med pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: asataH ca pratyaya aBAvAt
# rgya gar skad du: med pa ni rkyen du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yadi nirudDasya pratyaya tvam na izyate
# rgya gar skad du: gal te 'gags pa rkyen du mi 'dod na de ltar na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam ca sati aPalam eva karma syAt na hi vartamAnAt karmaNaH vipAkaH nirvartate
# rgya gar skad du: da ltar gyi las las ni rnam par smin pa mngon par mi 'grub pa las kyi 'bras bu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na etat evam
# rgya gar skad du: de ni de lta ma yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad ja BAvanA avasTAnAt
# rgya gar skad du: de las byung ba'i bsgos pa gnas pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: karma AhitAyAH citta santAne vAsanAyAH paripAka viSezam gatAyAH vipAkaH nirvartate
# rgya gar skad du: gang las 'gyur ba bye brag tu gyur nas rnam par smin pa 'grub pa'i bag chags las kyis bskyed pa sems kyi rgyud la yod do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasmAt na viPalam karma
# rgya gar skad du: de lta bas na las kyi 'bras bu med pa ma yin la

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ca nirudDAt karmaNaH vipAkaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: las 'gags pa las rnam par smin pa 'byung ba yang ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pratisanDO ca nAma rUpam eva
# rgya gar skad du: nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe ni ming dang gzugs kyi yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na kevalam vijQAnam
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig ni ma yin na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra vijQAnam eva saMskAra pratyayam
# rgya gar skad du: de la rnam par shes pa nyid 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis byung gi

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ca nAma rUpam iti kA atra yuktiH
# rgya gar skad du: ming dang gzugs ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci yod

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasmAt saMskAra pratyayam nAma rUpam iti vaktavyam
# rgya gar skad du: de lta bas na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes brjod par bya'i

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na tu vijQAnam iti [p. 103]
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: katamat vA anyat vijQAna pratyayam nAma rUpam
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba gzhan gang zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yat pratisanDi kzaNAt uttara kAlam
# rgya gar skad du: nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig las dus phyi ma gang yin pa'o zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasya prAtisanDikAt nAma rUpAt kaH AtmA atiSayaH yatas tat eva vijQAna pratyayam na pUrvam
# rgya gar skad du: de nying mtshams sbyor ba'i ming dang gzugs las rang bzhin bye brag tu gyur pa ci yod na 'di ltar de nyid rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba yin la

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pUrvam ca saMskAra pratyayam na uttaram iti atas ca saMskAra pratyayam nAma rUpam eva astu
# rgya gar skad du: snga ma ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis byung ba yin la phyi ma ni ma yin te de'i phyir 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs nyid du 'gyur gyi

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim pratisanDi vijQAnena aFga antareNa parikalpitena
# rgya gar skad du: nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes ba'i yan lag gzhan kun du brtags pas ci zhig bya

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasmAt na pratisanDi vijQAnam saMskAra pratyayam yujyate
# rgya gar skad du: de lta bas na nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis byung bar mi rung ngo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: saMskArAH tu avidyA pratyayAH tad aDivAsitam ca vijQAnam saMskAra pratyayam tad pratyayam pratisanDO ca nAma rUpam eva iti ezA eva nItiH
# rgya gar skad du: 'du byed rnams ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba yin la des bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis byung ba dang de'i rkyen gyis byung ba nying mtshams sbyor ba ni ming dang gzugs nyid do zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di la ni nyes pa med do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: zaz vijQAna kAyAH saMskAra pariBAvitAH saMskAra pratyayam vijQAnam iti ayam api pakzaH durGawitaH eva
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa dag 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i phyogs 'di yang sbyar ma legs pa nyid de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim kAraNam
# rgya gar skad du: ci'i phyir zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na hi vijQAnam vipAka vAsanAm nizyanda vAsanAm vA Atmani ADAtum samarTam
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par smin pa'i bag chags dang rgyu mthun pa'i bag chags bdag la skyed par mi nus te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Atmani kAritra viroDAt
# rgya gar skad du: bdag la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na api anantare
# rgya gar skad du: de ma theg pa la yang ma yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasya tadA anutpanna tvAt anutpannasya ca asattvAt
# rgya gar skad du: de ni de'i tshe ma byung ba'i phyir ro ma byung ba ni med pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na api utpanne
# rgya gar skad du: byung ba la yang ma yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pUrvasya tadA nirudDa tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: de ni de'i tshe sngar 'gags pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: acittakAsu ca midDa Adi avasTAsu punar saMskAra pariBAvita citta utpatti asamBavAt vijQAna pratyayam nAma rUpam na syAt
# rgya gar skad du: sems med pa'i gnyid kyis log pa la sogs pa'i dus na ni 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i sems 'byung mi srid pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs med par 'gyur ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad aBAvAt zaz Ayatanam na syAt
# rgya gar skad du: de med par skye mched drug kyang med par 'gyur ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam yAvat jarA maraNam na syAt
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du rga shi'i bar du yang med par 'gyur ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatas ca saMsAra pravRttiH eva viruDyate
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir 'khor bar 'jug pa nyid dang 'gal lo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: saMsAra nivRttiH api AlayavijQAne asati na upapadyate
# rgya gar skad du: 'khor ba las ldog pa yang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na mi 'thad de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: saMsArasya hi karma kleSAH kAraNam
# rgya gar skad du: 'khor ba'i rgyu ni las dang nyon mongs pa rnams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tayoH kleSAH pra[p. 104]DAnam
# rgya gar skad du: de gnyis las kyang nyon mongs pa ni gtso bo ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: taTA hi kleSa ADipatyAt karma punarBava Akzepa samarTam Bavati na anyaTA
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis na las kyis yang srid pa 'phen nus par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas eva na dRzwa satyAnAm karmANi punarBavam Akzipanti darSana prahAta vya kleSa aBAvAt
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir bden pa mthong ba rnams kyi las las yang srid pa mi 'phen te mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Akzipta punarBavam api karma kleSa aBAvAt na punarBavIBavati iti
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du yang srid pa 'phangs pa'i las kyang nyon mongs pa med na yang srid pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: taTA hi trEDAtuka vIta rAgANAm Akzipta punarBavam api karma kleSa aBAvAt BavIBavitum na utsahate
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ltar khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi yang srid pa 'phangs pa'i las kyang nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir yang srid pa 'byung bar byed mi nus so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas ca tezAm punarBavaH na aBinirvartate
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir de dag gi yang srid pa mngon par mi 'grub bo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam ca praDAna tvAt kleSAH eva saMsAra pravRtteH mUlam
# rgya gar skad du: de ltar na gtso bo yin pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa nyid 'khor bar 'jug pa'i rtsa ba ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas tezu prahINezu saMsAraH nivartate na anyaTA
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir de dag spangs na 'khor ba las ldog par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ca Alaya vijQAnam antareNa tad prahANam yujyate
# rgya gar skad du: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med par de dag spang du mi rung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sammuKIBUtaH vA kleSaH prahIyeta
# rgya gar skad du: nyon mongs pa mngon du gyur pa'am

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: bIja avasTaH vA
# rgya gar skad du: sa bon gyi tshe spang grang na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra sammuKIBUtaH prahIyate iti anizwiH eva iyam
# rgya gar skad du: de la mngon du gyur pa spang ngo zhe na ni de mi 'dod pa nyid de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tadA tad prahANa mArga aBAvAt
# rgya gar skad du: de'i tshe de dag spong ba'i lam med pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: bIja avasTaH api na eva prahIyate
# rgya gar skad du: sa bon gyi tshe yang spang du mi rung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na hi pratipakzAt tadAnIm kiQcid anyat aByupagamyate yatra kleSa bIjam vyavasTitam tad pratipakzeNa prahIyeta
# rgya gar skad du: gang la nyon mongs pa'i sa bon gnas pa de gnyen pos spong na de'i tshe ni gnyen po las ci yang khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: aTa pratipakza cittaH eva kleSa bIja anuzaktam izyate na hi kleSa bIja anuzaktam eva tad pratipakzaH yujyate
# rgya gar skad du: ji ste gnyen po'i sems nyid nyon mongs pa'i sa bon dang 'dres na ni nyon mongs pa'i sa bon dang 'dres pa nyid pas gnyen por mi rung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ca aprahINa kleSa bIjAnAm saMsAra vinivRttiH samBavati iti tasmAt avaSyam AlayavijQAnam tad anya vijQAna saha BUtEH kleSa upakleSEH BAvya
# rgya gar skad du: nyon mongs pa'i sa bon ma spangs pa rnams ni 'khor ba las ldog mi srid do de lta bas na gdon mi za bar kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis rang gi sa bon gso bar bya ba'i phyir bag chags bsgo bar khas blangs so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: punar ca tatas eva santati pariNAma viSezAt yaTAbalam BAvanA vRtti lABe sati kleSa upakleSAH pravartante
# rgya gar skad du: rgyun 'gyur ba'i bye brag gi stobs ji lta ba bzhin du bsgos pa 'jug pa rnyed nas yang de nyid las nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'byung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tezAm [p. 105] cAlaya vijQAna vyavasTitam bIjam tad sahaBuvA kleSa pratipakza mArgeNa apanIyate
# rgya gar skad du: de dag gi sa bon kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa ni de dang lhan cig 'byung ba nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po lam gyis sel to

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasmin ca apanIte punar tena ASrayeNa kleSAnAm anutpattiH iti sa upaDi SezaH nirvANa DAtuH prApyate
# rgya gar skad du: de bsal nas gnas de nas nyon mongs pa rnams mi 'byung bas phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings thob bo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pUrva karma Akzipta janma niroDe ca tatas anya janma apratisanDAnAt nirupaDi SezaH nirvANa DAtuH
# rgya gar skad du: sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i skye ba ni 'gags la de las gzhan pa'i skye ba dang nying mtshams mi sbyor ba ni lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na hi karma vidyamAnam api kleSezu prahINezu sahakAri kAraNa aBAvAt punarBavam aBinirvartayitum samarTam
# rgya gar skad du: las yod du zin kyang nyon mongs pa rnams spangs na lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir yang srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed mi nus so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas eva Alaya vijQAne sati saMsAra pravRttiH nivRttiH ca na anyaTA iti avaSyam Alaya vijQAnam aByupagantavyam
# rgya gar skad du: de ltar na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yod na 'khor bar 'jug pa dang ldog par rung gi gzhan du ni ma yin te gdon mi za bar kun gzhi rnam par shes pa khas blang bar bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim kAraNam tat Alaya vijQAnam iti ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: ci'i phyir kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bya zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AlayavijQAna tvam punar tasya sarva bIja AlayatAm
# rgya gar skad du: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'di ni sa bon thams cad kyi gzhi nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: upAdAya iti ante apadizwam sarvatra aBisambaDyate
# rgya gar skad du: phyir ro zhes bya ba tha mar gang bstan pa de ni thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Alaya vijQAna BAvaH AlayavijQAna tvam
# rgya gar skad du: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i dngos po ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat punar AlayavijQAna Sabda pravRtti nimittam
# rgya gar skad du: de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'jug pa'i rgyu'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra vijAnAti iti vijQAnam
# rgya gar skad du: de la rnam par shes par byed pas rnam par shes pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad vyatirikta vijQAtra BAva pradarSana arTam BAva mAtre kartR vyapadeSaH
# rgya gar skad du: de las ma gtogs par shes par byed pa po med par bstan pa'i phyir dngos po tsam la byed par bstan to

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sarva bIja AlayatA sarva sAFkleSika Darma bIja sTAna tA
# rgya gar skad du: sa bon thams cad kyi gzhi nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi sa bon thams cad kyi gnas nyid do;

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Alayam sTAnam iti paryAyaH
# rgya gar skad du: gzhi ni gnas kyi rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: aTavA AlIyante upanibaDyante asmin sarva DarmAH kArya BAvena
# rgya gar skad du: yang na 'dir chos thams cad 'bras bu'i dngos por sbyor zhing nye bar 'brel ba'am

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat vAlIyate upanibaDyate kAraNa BAvena sarva Darmezu iti AlayaH
# rgya gar skad du: de chos thams cad la rgyu'i dngos por sbyor zhing nye bar 'brel bas kun gzhi'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: [p. 106] Atma BAva Alaya nimitta tAm ca upAdAya Atma BAvaH nAma rUpam
# rgya gar skad du: lus kyi kun gzhi nyid dang rgyu nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba la lus ni ming dang gzugs so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AlIyate asmin Atma BAvaH
# rgya gar skad du: der lus sbyor te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad balena anuvRttitaH iti AlayaH
# rgya gar skad du: de'i stobs kyis 'byung bas kun gzhi nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad BAvaH AlayatA
# rgya gar skad du: de'i dngos po ni kun gzhi nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Atma BAva nimittam tad bIja paripozAt pratisanDO Atma BAva nirvartanAt
# rgya gar skad du: lus kyi rgyu ni de'i sa bon yongs su gsos pas nying mtshams sbyor ba ni lus mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Atma BAva AlayatAm Atma BAva nimitta tAm ca upAdAya Alaya vijQAna tvam aByupagantavyam
# rgya gar skad du: lus kyi gzhi nyid dang lus kyi rgyu nyid yin pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid khas blang bar bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: anye punar anyaTA paWanti
# rgya gar skad du: gzhan nas de bzhin du 'byung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Atma mAnAlaya nimitta tAm ca upAdAya iti
# rgya gar skad du: bdag tu nga rgyal gyi gzhi dang rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Alaya vijQAnam Atma tvena AlambamAnasya yaH mAnaH saH Atma mAna
# rgya gar skad du: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la bdag tu dmigs pa'i nga rgyal gang yin pa de bdag tu nga rgyal lo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AlIyate tasmin vizayi BAvena Atma mAnaH iti Alaya vijQAnam Atma mAnAlayaH
# rgya gar skad du: bdag tu nga rgyal ni 'di la yul can gyi dngos por sbyor bas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni bdag tu nga rgyal gyi kun gzhi'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AlIyate vA tat nimitta BAvena Atma mAnaH iti AlayaH ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: yang na de dag tu nga rgyal la rgyu'i dngos por sbyor bas kun gzhi zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Sezam pUrvavat
# rgya gar skad du: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kAya AlInatAm ca upAdAya iti caSabdaH samuccaya arTaH
# rgya gar skad du: lus la gnas pa nyid kyi yang phyir ro zhes bya ba la yang zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i don to

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kAyaH atra sa indriyam SarIram
# rgya gar skad du: lus ni 'dir dbang po dang bcas pa'i khog pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: samantam hi SarIram vyApya Alaya vijQAnam vartate
# rgya gar skad du: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni khog pa thams cad la khyab pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas kAya pratibadDa vRtti tvAt tat kAye AlInam iti kAya alInam
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir lus dang 'brel bar 'jug pas lus la gnas pa'i phyir lus la gnas pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad BAvaH kAya AlInatA
# rgya gar skad du: de'i dngos po ni lus la gnas pa nyid de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tAm kAya AlIna tAm upAdAya gRhItvA Alaya vijQAna tvam asya pratipattavyam
# rgya gar skad du: lus la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir bzung nas 'di kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid du khong du chud par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na kevalam Alaya vijQAnam etat ucyate kim tarhi AdAna vijQAnam api iti
# rgya gar skad du: de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi len pa'i rnam par shes pa yang de yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim kAraNam tat AdAna vijQAnam iti ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: ci'i phyir de len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas kAraNam Aha   kAya upAdAna tAm upAdAya iti
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir lus len pa'i phyir ro zhes rgyu smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AdIyate kA[p. 107]yaH anena iti AdAna vijQAnam iti ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: 'dis lus len bas len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: cittena kAyasya upAdAnam na anyena iti prasidDam
# rgya gar skad du: sems kyis lus len gyi bdag gis ni ma yin no zhes bya bar rab tu grub bo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat ca yat pUrva saMskAra hetukam Sukra SoNita sammUrCita avasTAyAm Bavam upAdatte
# rgya gar skad du: de yang sngon gyi 'du byed kyi rgyu las 'byung ba ste khu ba dang khrag gi nang du brgyal ba'i dus na srid pa len te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat evA maraNAt kAya upAdAtR tvena izyate
# rgya gar skad du: de nyid shi ba la thug gi bar lus len par byed par 'dod kyi

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na cakzuH Adi vijQAnAni tad pRzWa labDam vA manaH vijQAnam
# rgya gar skad du: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams dang de'i rjes las byung ba yid kyi rnam par shes pas ni ma yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tezAm tatas UrDvam vartamAna cakzuH Adi pratyaya nimitta tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: de dag ni de'i 'og tu mig la sogs pa rkyen rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ca tatra anyat manaH vijQAnam saMskAra hetukam
# rgya gar skad du: de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa gzhan 'du byed kyi rgyu las byung ba ni ma yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasya kuSala akuSala tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: de dag dge ba dang mi dge ba'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: saMskAra hetukam hi ekAntena avyAkRtam vipAka tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: 'du byed kyi rgyu las byung ba ni rnam par smin pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu lung ma bstan pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: vipAkaH ca na vicCinnaH sanDIyate cakzuH Adi vat
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par smin pa la yang mig la sogs pa bzhin du rgyun chad nas yang nying mtshams sbyor ba ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ca Alaya vijQAnAt anyat ekAntena avyAkRta jAtIyam upalaByate yat vipAka vijQAna tvena parikalpyeta
# rgya gar skad du: gang rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid kun du rtag pa gcig tu lung ma bstan pa'i rang bzhin can ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las gzhan ma mthong ngo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: api ca pratiniyata ASraya pravRtta tvAt zaNNAm vijQAna kAyAnAm vicCeda pravRtta tvAt ca na sarvasya ASrayasya upAdAnam prasajyate
# rgya gar skad du: yang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po dag ni gnas so sor nges pa las 'byung ba dang rgyun chad nas 'byung ba'i phyir gnas thams cad len par mi rung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: taTA hi yena yena ASrayeNa yat vijQAnam pravartate saH eva tena upAttaH syAt
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ltar gnas gang dang gang las rnam par shes pa gang 'byung ba des de nyid zin par 'gyur gyi

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: avaSizwasya anupAtta tvam vijQAna virahita tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: lhag ma ni rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir zin pa ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: taTA cakzuH Adi vijQAnam vicCedena punar punar pravartate iti tad ASrayasya punar punar upAdAna doza prasaFgaH
# rgya gar skad du: de ltar mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rgyun chad nas yang dang yang 'byung ba'i phyir gnas de yang dang yang nye bar len pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasmAt Alaya vijQAnam eva pratisanDO kAyam upAdatte A maraNAt [p. 108] ca samasta kAya ASrayeNa pravartate iti tat eva pratisanDi ba
# rgya gar skad du: de lta bas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid nying mtshams sbyor ba'i dus nas lus bzung nas shi ba la thug gi bar du lus mtha' dag la brten te 'byung bas de nyid nying mtshams sbyor ba nas shi ba la thug gi bar du lus 'dzin pas na len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: prADAnyena manaH Alaya vijQAna Alambanam iti
# rgya gar skad du: dngos su na yid kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la dmigs zhes bya ba ni

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: klizwam hi manaH AlayavijQAnam Atma tvena nityam Alambate
# rgya gar skad du: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la rtag par bdag tu dmigs te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Atma AlambanEH moha dRzwi mAna snehEH samprayukta tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: bdag tu rmongs pa dang lta ba dang nga rgyal dang chags par dmigs pa rnams dang mtshungs bar ldan pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat ca nityakAlam manyana Atmaka tvAt manaH
# rgya gar skad du: de yang rtag par rlom sems pa'i bdag nyid yin pas yod do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: prADAnyena tat eva manaH ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: dngos su na de yid ces bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yat zaNNAm cakzuH Adi vijQAna kAyAnAm samanantara nirudDam vijQAnam manaH iti uktam
# rgya gar skad du: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po dag 'gags ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa la yid ces brjod pa gang yin pa

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat zazWasya manaH vijQAnasya ASraya prasidDi arTam na tu manyana AkAra tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: de ni drug pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas sgrub pa'i phyir yin gyi ngar sems pa'i rna ba'i phyir ni ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas na tasya prADAnyena manaH tvam
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir dngos su na de ni yid nyid ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat caturBiH kleSEH nityam samprayuktam Atma moha Atma dRzwi Atma mAna Atma snehEH
# rgya gar skad du: de yang bdag tu rmongs pa dang bdag tu lta ba dang bdag tu nga rgyal dang bdag la chags pa ste nyon mongs pa bzhi dang rtag par mtshungs par ldan te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atra tu Atma grahaNam na moha mAtreNa samprayujyate
# rgya gar skad du: de la bdag tu rmongs pa ni gti mug tsam dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin gyi

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim tarhi Atmani yaH mohaH
# rgya gar skad du: bdag tu rmongs pa gang yin pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam yAvat Atma snehe vaktavyam
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du bdag la chags pa'i bar dag la yang brjod par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Adi grahaNAt paQcaBiH sarvatragEH ca sparSa manaskAra AdiBiH sadA samprayuktam
# rgya gar skad du: sogs pa ni reg pa dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa kun du 'gro ba lnga po dag dang yang rab tu mtshungs par ldan pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasya apratIta tvAt cEttAnAm api cEttEH samprayogAt ca tad svarUpa nirDAraNa arTam Aha   vijQAnam iti
# rgya gar skad du: de yang ma grags pa dang sems las byung ba rnams dang mtshungs par ldan pas na de'i rang gi ngo bo dmigs kyis dbye ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa ste zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ekajAtIyam iti klizwa jAtIyam
# rgya gar skad du: rigs gcig pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi rigs yin gyi

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na kuSalam avyAkRtam vA
# rgya gar skad du: dge ba'am lung du ma bstan pa ni ma yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: [p. 109] nityam Atma moha AdiBiH caturBiH kleSEH samprayukta tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: bdag tu rmongs pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa bzhi dang rtag tu mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: santAna anuvRtti ca iti avicCedena vartate iti arTaH
# rgya gar skad du: rgyun chags par 'jug pa ste zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: asya utsargasya apavAdam AraBate   arhat tu a Arya mArga niroDa samApatti avasTAm sTApayitvA
# rgya gar skad du: spyir btang ba 'di'i dmigs kyis bsal ba rtsom ste dgra bcom pa dang 'phags pa'i lam dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus ma gtogs so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: arhat tvA avasTAyAm na pravartate arhataH niravaSeza trEDAtuka klizwa Darma prahINa tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: dgra bcom pa ni khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi chos spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa'i dus ni mi 'byung ngo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Arya mArga avasTAyAm api na pravartate
# rgya gar skad du: 'phags pa'i lam gyi dus na yang mi 'byung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: parama arTa jQAnasya Atma dRzwi samudAcAreNa atyanta viroDAt
# rgya gar skad du: de na dam pa shes pa ni bdag tu lta ba kun du 'byung ba dang shin tu mi mthun pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatas UrDvam asya Alaya vijQAnAt pravRttiH
# rgya gar skad du: de'i 'og tu kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las 'byung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: SEkzasya aprahINa tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: slob pa'i dus na ma spangs pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: niroDa samApatti avasTAyAm api na pravartate
# rgya gar skad du: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus na yang mi 'byung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: asaQjQi samApattitaH niroDa samApatteH SAntatara tvam tad asamucAra tvAt eva veditavyam
# rgya gar skad du: 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bas [?] 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa ches zhe ba'i phyir de kun du mi 'byung bar rig par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atra ca manaH nirvacanataH AlambanataH samprayogataH pravRtti kAlataH ca nirdizwam veditavyam
# rgya gar skad du: 'dir ni nges pa'i tshig dang dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang 'byung pa'i dus kyi yid bstan par rig par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kena arTena rUpa Adi skanDAH iti ucyante
# rgya gar skad du: ci'i phyir phung po zhes bya zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: rASi arTena rASiH skanDaH iti paryAyaH
# rgya gar skad du: spungs pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba la spungs pa ni phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su gtogs pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: etat uktam Bavati   rUpa rASI rUpa skanDaH
# rgya gar skad du: de ni 'di skad du gzugs spungs pa ni gzugs kyi phung po ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam yAvat vijQAna rASiH vijQAna skanDaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du sbungs pa la rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bstan par 'gyur ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yasmAt sUtre   aDva santAna prakAra gati deSa Beda BinnAnAm rUpa AdInAm saFkzepa saFgraha tAm upAdAya rUpa AdayaH skanDAH uktAH
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ltar mdo las dus dang rgyu dang rnam pa dang 'gro ba dang yul tha dad pa'i gzugs la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa phung por bstan te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yat kiQcid rUpam atIta anAgata pratyutpannam ADyAtmikam vA bAhyam vA Odarikam vA sUkzmam vA hInam [p. 110] vA praNItam vA yat vA d
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa'am da ltar byung pa'am nang gi'am phyi'i'am rags pa'am phra ba'am ngan pa'am gya nom pa'am thag nye ba gang yin pa'am

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sarvam EkaDyam aBisaFkzipya rUpa skanDaH iti saFKyAm gacCati iti evam yAvat vijQAnam
# rgya gar skad du: rgyang ring ba gang yin pa thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du'o zhes 'byung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atIta anAgata pratyutpannAH iti aDva Bedena BinnAH
# rgya gar skad du: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes bya ba'i bye brag gis dus tha dad pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ADyAtmikA vA bAhyA vA iti santAna Bedena
# rgya gar skad du: nang ngam phyi zhes bya ba ni rgyu tha dad pas so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yasmAt ADyAtmikAH svAsa antAnikAH
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ltar nang gi rnams ni rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa dag go

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: bAhyAH tatas anye
# rgya gar skad du: phyi'i rnams ni de las gzhan pa dag go

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: OdArikA vA sUkzmA vA iti prakAra Bedena
# rgya gar skad du: rags pa'am phra ba zhes bya ba ni rnam pa'i bye brag gis so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra rUpasya Apekzikam OdArika sUkzma tvam
# rgya gar skad du: de la gzugs kyi rags pa dang phra ba nyid ni ltos ba can no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sa pratiGam OdArikam
# rgya gar skad du: yang na thogs pa dang bcas pa ni rags pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: apratiGam sUkzmam
# rgya gar skad du: thogs pa med pa ni phra ba'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: vedanA saQjQA saMskAra vijQAnAni tu paQca indriya ASraya utpannAni OdArikANi
# rgya gar skad du: tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rnams kyang dbang po lnga la brten te byung ba dag ni rags pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: mAnasAni sUkzmANi
# rgya gar skad du: yid la brten te byung ba dag ni phra ba'o;

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: hInA vA praNItA vA iti gati Bedena BinnAH
# rgya gar skad du: ngan pa'am gya nom pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i bye brag gis tha dad pa rnams te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: taTA hi hIna gati saFgRhItAH hInAH praNIta gati saFgRhItAH praNItAH
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ltar 'gro ba ngan pas zin pa dag ni ngan pa rnams so 'gro ba gya nom pas zin pa dag ni gya nom pa rnams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yat vA dUre yat vAntikaH iti deSa Bedena BinnAH
# rgya gar skad du: thag nye ba gang yin pa'am rgyang ring po gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni yul gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa rnams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: vedanA AdInAm tu dUra antika tvam ASraya vaSena
# rgya gar skad du: tshor ba la sogs pa ni gnas kyi dbang gis nye ba dang ring ba'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: rUpa AdInAm iti rUpa vedanA saQjQA saMskAra vijQAnAnAm
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rnams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: saFkzepa saFgraha tAm upAdAya iti aDva santAna prakAra gati deSa Beda BinnAnAm rUpa vedanA saQjQA saMskAra vijQAnAnAm pratyekam saFkzepeNa sa
# rgya gar skad du: mdor bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dus dang rgyu dang rnam pa dang 'gro ba dang yul tha dad pa rnams kyi gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rnams so sor mdor bsdus pa ni mdor bsdus pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad BAvaH saFkzepa saFgraha tA
# rgya gar skad du: de'i dngos po ni mdor bsdus pa nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tAm saFkzepa saFgraha tAm upAdAya sUtre rASi arTaH skanDa arTaH vijQAyate
# rgya gar skad du: de dag mdor bsdus pa'i phyir mdo las sbungs pa'i don zhes 'byung ba ni phung po'i don ni zhes bya bar shes te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: taTA hi uktam tat sarvam atIta Adikam rUpam [p. 111] ekaDyam aBisaFkzipya rUpa skanDaH iti saFKyAm gacCati iti
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ltar 'das pa la sogs pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad ni gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba nas

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam yAvat vijQAnam
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar du bstan to

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: uktAH paQca skanDAH skanDa arTaH ca
# rgya gar skad du: phung po lnga po rnams dang phung po'i don bshad zin to

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sarva saMskArAH paQca skanDa saFgraheNa uktAH sarva DarmAH saMskRtAH asaMskRtAH ca Ayatana DAtu saFgraheNa tatra skanDa nirdeSa anantaram Aya
# rgya gar skad du: phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa bye brag tu bshad pa bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma'o 'dus byas thams cad ni phung po lngas bsdus la 'dus byas dang; 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad ni skye mched dang khams su bsdus par bstan pa de la phung po bshad pa'i 'og tu skye mched rnams brjod dgos pas du zhig gang dang gang skye mched kyi don ni ci zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kaH ca Ayatana arTaH iti atas Aha   dvAdaSa AyatanAni iti
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir skye mched bcu gnyis zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tAni punar katamAni
# rgya gar skad du: de dag kyang gang zhe na;

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: cakzuH Ayatanam rUpa Ayatanam yAvat manaA Ayatanam Darma Ayatanam ca iti
# rgya gar skad du: mig gi skye mched dang gzugs kyi skye mched dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas yid kyi skye mched dang chos kyi skye mched do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: cakzuH AdInAm pUrvavat nirdeSaH iti rUpa skanDa viBAge yaTA cakzuH AdayaH svarUpataH nirdizwAH taTA iha api svarUpataH nirdezwavyAH iti
# rgya gar skad du: mig la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du bshad do zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung po rnam par phye ba ni ji ltar mig la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa de bzhin du 'dir yang rang gi ngo bo bstan par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra hi uktam catvAri mahABUtAni upAdAya varNa vizayaH rUpa prasAdaH cakzuH indriyam iti
# rgya gar skad du: de la mig gi dbang po ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi rgyur byas pa ste yul kha dog gzugs dang ba'o zhes bstan to

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam Sabda ganDa rasa sprazwavya vizayAH yaTAkramam rUpa AtmakAH prasAdAH Srotra AdayaH
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya yang yul te; go rims bzhin no rna ba la sogs pa yang gzugs kyi bdag nyid dang ba'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: rUpa Sabda ganDa rasa AyatanAnAm ca pUrvavat nirdeSaH iti sambaDyate
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro'i skye mched rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pUrvam hi nirdizwaH cakzuzaH vizayaH varNaH saMsTAnam vijQaptiH ca rUpam
# rgya gar skad du: sngar ni mig gi yul ni kha dog dang dbyibs dang rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: upAtta anupAtta uBaya mahABUta hetukaH Srotrasya vizayaH SabdaH ityAdi
# rgya gar skad du: rna ba'i yul ni sgra ste zin pa dang ma zin pa dang gnyi ga'i ste 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan to

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: mahABUtAni yaH [p. 112] ca sprazwavyasya eka deSaH uktaH
# rgya gar skad du: 'byung ba chen po dag dang gang reg bya'i phyogs gcig bshad pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat saha mahABUtEH sprazwavya Ayatanam
# rgya gar skad du: de 'byung ba chen po rnams dang bcas pa ni reg bya'i skye mched do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat punar SlakzNa tvam ityAdi
# rgya gar skad du: de yang 'jam pa nyid la sogs pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: manaA Ayatanam yaH vijQAna skanDaH iti azwO vijQAnAni vijQAna skanDaH
# rgya gar skad du: yid kyi skye mched ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la rnam par shes pa brgyad ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: zaw pravRtti vijQAnAni AlayavijQAnam klizwam ca manaH
# rgya gar skad du: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug dang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang nyon mongs pa can gyi yod do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Ayatana vyavasTAyAm tu vijQAna skanDaH eva manaA Ayatanam ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: skye mched rnam par gzhag pa la ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po nyid la yid kyi skye mched ces bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: punar azwa prakAram
# rgya gar skad du: chos kyi skye mched ni rnam pa brgyad de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: vedanA saQjQA saMskAra skanDA avijQaptiH ca asaMskRtAni ca catvAri
# rgya gar skad du: tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed kyi phung po dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang 'dus ma byas bzhi'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra vedanA saQjQA saMskAra skanDAH avijQaptiH ca skanDa viBaFgaH eva uktAH
# rgya gar skad du: de la tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed kyi phung po dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni phung po rnam par phye bas bshad pa yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: asaMskRtam tu na uktam iti atas tad praBeda buButsayA pRcCati
# rgya gar skad du: 'dus ma byas ni ma bshad de de'i phyir de dag rab tu dbye bar 'dod nas

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: asaMskRtam katamat iti
# rgya gar skad du: 'dus ma byas gang zhe na zhes dris so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yat na hetu pratyaya pratibadDa svarUpam tat asaMskRtam ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: gang rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa ma yin pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo ni 'dus ma byas zhes bya ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AkASam apratisaFKyA niroDaH pratisaFKyA niroDaH taTatA ca iti
# rgya gar skad du: nam mkha' dang so sor brtags ba ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang so so brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang de bzhin nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: asaMskRta praBeda pradarSanam
# rgya gar skad du: 'dus ma byas kyi rab tu dbye ba ston te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AkASam katamat iti AkASa svarUpa avaboDa arTam praSnaH
# rgya gar skad du: nam mkha' gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i rang gi ngo bo khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir 'dri ba'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yaH rUpa avakASaH iti tad svarUpa nirdeSaH
# rgya gar skad du: gang gzugs kyi go 'byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni de'i rang gi ngo bo bshad pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam apratisaFKyA niroDa Adizu api pratyekam vAcyam
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du so sor brtags pa ma yin pa la sogs pa so sor brjod par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sa pratiGam rUpam yatra pradeSe na pratihanyate sa tasya avakASaH
# rgya gar skad du: phyogs gang du thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs la thogs par mi byed pa ni go 'byed pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas rUpiNAm BAvAnAm avakASa dAnAt AkASam iti ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir dngos po gzugs can rnams la skabs 'byed pa nam mkha' zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AkA[p. 113]SAnantaram uddizwa tvAt tad nirdeSa anantaram eva apratisaFKyA niroDa svarUpa avaboDa arTam praSnaH
# rgya gar skad du: nam mkha'i 'og tu bstan pa'i phyir de bshad pa'i 'og tu so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa'i rang gi ngo bo khong du chud par 'dod nas

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: apratisaFKyA niroDaH katamaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa gang zhe na zhes dris so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: saFKyAnam tulanam vicayaH prajQA iti anarTa antaram
# rgya gar skad du: brtags pa dang gzhal ba dang rnam par 'byed pa dang shes rab ces bya ba ni don gcig go

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pratiH vIpsA arTaH
# rgya gar skad du: so sor zhes bya ba ni spyir bsnyag pa'i don te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: etat uktam Bavati   duHKa AdInAm Arya satyAnAm pratipratisaFKyAnam pratisaFKyA
# rgya gar skad du: de ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la so sor rtog pa ni so sor brtags pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: prajQA viSezaH iti arTaH
# rgya gar skad du: shes rab kyi khyad par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes bstan par 'gyur ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na pratisaFKyA pratisaFKyA
# rgya gar skad du: so sor ma brtags pa ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pa ste
