# rgya gar skad du: de yang gang zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pratyaya vEkalyam
# rgya gar skad du: rkyen ma tshang ba'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: etat uktam Bavati   pratyaya vEkalyAt anAgatAnAm DarmANAm yaH atyantam anutpAdaH saH apratisaFKyA niroDaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: de ni 'di skad du rkyen ma tshang ba'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams gtan du mi skye ba gang yin pa de so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yaH niroDaH na ca visaMyogaH ityAdi praSna vyAkaraNam
# rgya gar skad du: gang 'gog pa la 'bral ba ma yin pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dri ba'i lan no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: niroDa SabdaH hi atra pratisaFKyA niroDa samApatti upapatti anitya tA niroDezu api vartate iti pratisaFKyA niroDa vyavacCeda arTam Aha   n
# rgya gar skad du: 'gog pa zhes byas na ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa bzhin du so sor brtags pa dang; snyoms par 'jug pa dang skye ba dang mi rtag pa'i 'gog pa rnams la yang snyegs pas 'dir so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa rnam par dbye ba'i phyir 'bral ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba smos te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: saMyogaH hi anAgatEH DarmEH bIje sati tezAm utpatti Darma tAm upAdAya vyavasTApyate
# rgya gar skad du: 'bral ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni sa bon yod na de dag 'byung ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams dang phrad par rnam par gzhag ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad pratipakzeNa sva ASrayAt tezAm bIje apodDRte yaH atyantam anutpAdaH [*...(?)] pratilabDaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: de'i gnyen pos rang gi gnas nas de dag gi sa bon bton bzhin gtan mi skye ba gang yin pa de 'gog pa'o de ni 'di skad du sa bon bton la blo sngon du ma btang yang rkyen ma tshang bas ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams gtan mi skye ba gang yin pa de so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro dgra bcom pa la ni ris gzhan dang 'brel ba'i dge ba dang lung dum bstan pa'i phung po rnams kyis bon yod bzhin du gtan mi skye ba thob pas

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: saH api apratisaFKyA niroDaH [p. 114] prApnoti iti atas Aha
# rgya gar skad du: de yang so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog par 'gyur ro zhe na de'i phyir

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sa punar yaH kleSa pratipakzeNa vinA skanDAnAm atyantam anutpAdaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: de ni gang nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po med par phung po rnams gtan du mi skye ba'o zhes bya ba smos te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: etat uktam Bavati
# rgya gar skad du: de ni 'di skad du

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ayam hi sati api kuSala akuSala avya akRta skanDa bIja sadBAvena vinA kleSa pratipakzeNa laByate iti pratisaFKyA niroDaH eva ayam
# rgya gar skad du: 'di la dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i phung po'i sa bon yod du zin kyang nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po med par mi thob pas so so brtags pa'i 'gog pa nyid de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na apratisaFKyA niroDaH
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ni so sor ma brtags pa'i 'gog pa ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam sa upaDi SezaH nirupaDi SezaH ca nirvANa DAtuH pratisaFKyA niroDaH iti uktam Bavati
# rgya gar skad du: de ltar na phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa zhes bstan pa yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kleSa pratipakzaH atra anAsravaH mArgaH aBipretaH
# rgya gar skad du: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ni 'dir zag pa med pa'i lam du bzhed do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atyantam anutpAdaH iti atyanta grahaNam upapatti samApatti niroDa vyavacCeda arTam
# rgya gar skad du: gtan du mi skye ba'o zhes bya ba la gtan du smos pa ni skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'gog pa las rnam par dbye ba'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sa hi anutpAdaH Bavati na tu atyantam
# rgya gar skad du: de dag mi skye ba yin la gtan du ma yin pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: punar citta cEtta utpAda sadBAvAt
# rgya gar skad du: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: anutpAdaH iti anitya tA niroDAt
# rgya gar skad du: mi skye ba'o zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid kyi 'gog pa las rnam par 'byed de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: anitya tA niroDaH hi vartamAnasya na ca vartamAnasya anutpAdaH asti
# rgya gar skad du: mi rtag pa nyid kyi 'gog pa ni de ltar yod la mi skye ba ni da ltar med pas ma 'ongs pa yin pa nyid de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim tarhi anAgatasya eva iti tat yaTA eka rUpa prakAra vyAsakta cakzuH vijQAnasya yAni vizaya antarANi utpattimanti rUpa prakAra antarANi ca
# rgya gar skad du: dper na gzugs kyi rnam pa gcig la mig gi rnam par shes pa yengs pa yul gzhan dang gzugs kyi rnam pa gzhan 'das pa gang yin pa

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad AlambanEH paQcaBiH vijQAna kAyEH na Sakyam utpattum
# rgya gar skad du: de dag ni dmigs pa de'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga bskyed par mi nus te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: vartamAnezu samanantara pratyaya aBAvAt
# rgya gar skad du: da ltar gyi rnam pa la ni de ma thag pa'i rkyen med cing

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atItezu Alambana pratyaya aBAvAt
# rgya gar skad du: 'das pa rnams la ni dmigs pa'i rkyen med pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas tezAm apra[p. 115]ti saFKyA niroDaH prApyate
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir de dag la so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog par 'gyur ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pratisaFKyA niroDaH katamaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa gang zhe na zhes bya ba la

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pratisaFKyAnam pratisaFKyA
# rgya gar skad du: so sor rtog pa ni so sor brtags pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Anantarya mArga saFgRhItaH prajQA viSezaH iti arTaH
# rgya gar skad du: bar chad med pa'i lam gyis shes rab kyi khyad par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pratisaFKyayA prApyaH niroDaH maDya pada lopAt
# rgya gar skad du: so sor brtags pas thob par bya ba'i 'gog pa ni so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa ste tshig bar ma ma smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yaH niroDaH iti sarva niroDa prasaFgaH iti Aha
# rgya gar skad du: gang 'gog pa zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa thams cad du thal bar 'gyur bas

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sa ca visaMyogaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: de ni 'brel pa ste zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam hi SezeByaH caturByaH niroDeByaH vyavacCinnaH Bavati
# rgya gar skad du: de ltar na 'gog pa lhag ma bzhi po las rnam par phye ba yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tezAm avisaMyoga Atmaka tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: de dag ni 'bral ba'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: visaMyogam eva nirUpayati   sa punar yaH kleSa pratipakzeNa skanDAnAm atyantam anutpAdaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: de ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen pos phung po gtan du mi skye ba'o zhes bya ba ni 'bral ba nyid dpyod pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ayam hi ASrayaH niravaSeza trEDAtuka kleSa bIja anusyUtaH pravartate
# rgya gar skad du: lus 'di ni khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon nam lus pa dang rjes su 'brel bar 'byung ba'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra yasya yasya yaH yaH mArgakzaNaH pratipakzaH tasmin mArgaH utpanne saH ASraya kzaNaH tad praheya kleSa bIja anugatam anantarasya ASray
# rgya gar skad du: de la gang dang gang gi gnyen po lam gyi skad cig gang dang gang yin pa'i lam de 'byung na lus kyi skad cig de ni des spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon dang ldan pa'i phyi ma lus kyi skad cig gzhan 'byung ba dang mi mthun pa'i rkyen du gyur pa dang phyi ma lus kyi skad cig gzhan skyed par mi nus te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad utpatti virudDa pratyayasAnniDyAt
# rgya gar skad du: de 'byung ba dang mi mthun pa'i rkyen nye bar gyur pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim tarhi tad praheya kleSa bIja vyAvRtti Atmakasya eva kAraNam Bavati
# rgya gar skad du: 'on kyang des spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon ldog pa bdag nyid kho na'i rgyur 'gyur te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad utpatti anuguNa pratyaya sadBAvAt
# rgya gar skad du: de byung ba dang mthun pa'i rkyen yod pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: saH eva mArgakzaNaH tad praheya kleza bIja anugatasya kzaNa antarasya utpattaye viguNaH pratyayaH [p. 116] itarasya anuguNaH veditavyaH
# rgya gar skad du: lam gyi skad cig de nyid ni des spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon dang ldan pa'i skad cig gzhan 'byung ba dang mi mthun pa'i rkyen du gyur pa dang cig shos dang mthun par brjod par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam yAvat BAvanA Aheyasya mRdu mRdoH kleSa prakArasya pratipakzaH utpanne saH ASrayaH niravaSeza trEDAtuka darSana BAvanA prahAta vyakleSa
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyon mongs pa chung du chung ngu'i bar gyi gnyen po byung na lus de khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i sa bon ma lus par ldog pa'i bdag nyid kho na'i skad cig gzhan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam yasya yasya kleSasya ASraya apravRttitaH bIjam udDRtam Bavati tasya tasya tad samprayuktAnAm ca DarmANAm kleSa pratipakzeNa Atyanta
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du nyon mongs pa gang dang gang gi lus mi 'byung bas sa bon bton par gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyang nyon mongs pa'i gnyen pos gtan du mi skye bar 'byung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sa ca pratisaFKyA niroDaH visaMyogaH ca iti ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa de ni 'bral ba zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pratisaFKyA niroDAt anantaram taTatA uddizwA iti atas tad nirdeSa anantaram taTatA avaboDa arTam praSnaH
# rgya gar skad du: so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa'i 'og tu de bzhin nyid bstan pas de'i phyir de bshad pa'i 'og tu de bzhin nyid khong du chud par 'dod nas

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: taTatA katama iti
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin nyid gang zhe na zhes 'dri'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yA DarmANAm DarmatA Darma nErAtmyam iti tat nirdeSaH
# rgya gar skad du: gang chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang chos bdag med pa nyid do zhes bya ba de ni de'i bshad pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ananyaTAtvena taTatA
# rgya gar skad du: gzhan ma yin pa'i don gyi phyir de bzhin nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DarmANAm iti rUpa vedanA saQjQA saMskAra vijQAnAnAm
# rgya gar skad du: chos rnams zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rnams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DarmANAm BAvaH DarmatA yATAtmyam BUta prakarzaH
# rgya gar skad du: chos rnams kyi dngos bo ni chos nyid de ji lta ba bzhin gyi bdag nyid dang yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DarmANAm kArya anitya tA AdayaH api DarmatA vidyante iti atas Aha   Darma nErAtmyam iti
# rgya gar skad du: chos nyid ni chos rnams kyi 'bras bu mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa yang chos rnams la yod de de'i phyir chos bdag med pa nyid ces bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DarmAH hi yena rUpeNa jQAna aBiDAnayoH vizayIBavanti
# rgya gar skad du: chos ni rang bzhin gang gis shes pa dang brjod pa gnyis kyi yul du 'gyur ba

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat tezAm AtmA
# rgya gar skad du: de de dag gi bdag ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasmAt AtmanaH nirgatA atad svaBAva tvAt iti nirAtmAnaH
# rgya gar skad du: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir bdag de dang bral ba ni bdag med pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad BAvaH Darma nErAtmyam
# rgya gar skad du: de'i dngos po ni bdag med pa nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat punar BAvAnAm kalpita svaBAva SUnyatA
# rgya gar skad du: de ni dngos po rnams rnam par brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atra tu vicAryamANe bahu vakta[p. 117]vyam jAyate iti alam prasaFgena prastutam eva AraByate
# rgya gar skad du: 'di la dpyad na brjod pa mang du 'byung ste de thal bar 'gyur bas kyang chog gi skabs nyid brtsam mo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kena arTena AyatanAni
# rgya gar skad du: ci'i phyir skye mched ces bya zhe na zhes bya ba la

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Ayatana SabdaH hi cakzuH Adizu paraspara viBinna rUpezu aviSezeNa pravartate iti atas tezu tena sAmAnyam arTam upAdAya pravartitavya
# rgya gar skad du: skye mched kyi sgra ni mig la sogs pa rang gi ngo bo phan tshun tha dad pa rnams la yang bye brag med par 'byung bas de'i phyir de dag la des spyi'i don rgyur byas nas 'jug go

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sa ca na vijQAyate iti praSnaH   kena arTena Ayatanani iti
# rgya gar skad du: de yang mi shes pas ci'i phyir skye mched ces bya zhes 'dri'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: vijQAnAya dvAra arTena iti
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par shes ba skye ba'i sgo'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AyaH ucyate AgamaH
# rgya gar skad du: skye ba zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: vijQAnAnAm utpattiH Atma lABaH
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par shes pa rnams 'byung bas bdag nyid thob pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: vijQAnAyasya dvAram hetuH kAraNam nimittam vijQAnAya dvAram
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par shes pa skye ba'i sgo ni rgyu ste byed rgyu dang rgyu mtshan ni rnam par shes pa skye ba'i sgo'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: etat uktam Bavati
# rgya gar skad du: de ni 'di skad du

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: vijQAna utpatti kAraNa arTena AyatanAni iti
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i rgyu'i phyir skye mched rnams zhes bya'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kaTam punar etat vijQAyate
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ltar ci mngon zhe na nges pa'i tshig gis mngon te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: nirvacanAt   citta cEttAnAm Ayam tanvanti vistRNvanti iti AyatanAni
# rgya gar skad du: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi 'byung ba mched par byed cing rgyas par byed pas skye mched rnams te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Atma lABam prabanDena sTApayanti iti arTaH
# rgya gar skad du: bdag thob par byed pa rgyun du 'jog ces bya ba'i tha tshig go

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra cakzuH rUpANi ca sa samprayogasya cakzuH vijQAnasya ayadvAram
# rgya gar skad du: de la mig dang gzugs rnams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa skye ba'i sgo yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam yAvat manaH DarmAH ca sa samprayogasya manaH vijQAnasya ayadvAram
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du yid dang chos rnams kyi bar dag kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'i skye ba'i sgo yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Ayatana anantaram DAtavaH praBedataH sva rUpataH ca vaktavyAH iti atas praBeda darSana arTam Aha
# rgya gar skad du: skye mched kyi 'og tu khams rnams rab tu dbye ba dang rang gi ngo bo brjod bar bya ste de bas na rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: azwAdaSa DAtavaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: khams bco brgyad ni zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tezAm eva svarUpa pradarSana arTam Aha   cakzuH DAtuH rUpa DAtuH cakzuH vijQAna DAtuH evam yAvat manaH DAtuH DarmaDAtuH manaH vijQAna DAtuH
# rgya gar skad du: de dag nyid kyi rang rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang zhes bya ba'i bar du smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atra hi rUpa skanDa viBAge yAni cakzuH Srotra GrANa rasana sparSanAni paQca indriyANi uktAni paQca ca rUpa Sabda ganDa rasa sparSAH tezAm v
# rgya gar skad du: 'dir yang gzugs kyi phung po rnam par dbye ba ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi dbang po gang yin pa lnga po dag dang gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa lnga yang de dag gi yul nyid du bstan to

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Ayatana [p. 118]vyavasTAyAm tAni eva paQca indriyANi cakzuH Adi Ayatana tvena uktAni rUpa AdayaH ca vizayA rUpa Adi Ayatana tvena
# rgya gar skad du: skye mched rnam par gzhag par yang dbang po lnga po de dag nyid mig la sogs pa'i skye mched nyid dang gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams kyang gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched nyid bstan to

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DAtu vyavasTAyAm te eva cakzuH DAtuH yAvat kAyaDAtuH rUpa DAtuH yAvat sprazwavya DAtuH iti uktam iti atas Aha
# rgya gar skad du: khams rnam par gzhag pa yang de dag nyid mig gi khams nas lus kyi khams kyi bar dang gzugs kyi khams nas reg bya'i khams kyi bar du bstan te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra cakzuH Adi DAtavaH rUpa Adi DAtavaH ca yaTA AyatanAni iti
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir mig la sogs pa'i khams dang gzugs la sogs pa'i khams ni skye mched rnams ji lta ba bzhin no zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DarmaDAtuH tu yat eva Darma Ayatanam vedanA AdayaH trayaH skanDAH avijQaptiH asaMskRta catuzwayam ca
# rgya gar skad du: chos kyi khams ni chos kyi skye mched tshor ba la sogs pa phung po gsum dang rnam bar rig byed ma yin pa dang 'dus ma byas pa zhi gang yin pa nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Ayatana vyavasTAyAm vijQAna skanDaH eva manaA Ayatanam
# rgya gar skad du: skye mched rnam par gzhag pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po nyid yid kyi skye mched do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na punar evam DAtu vyavasTAyAm manaA Ayatanam eva manaH DAtuH
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du khams rnam par gzhag par yang yid kyi skye mched nyid kyi khams ma yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim tarhi manaA Ayatanam DAtu vyavasTAyAm sapta citta DAtavaH
# rgya gar skad du: yid kyi skye mched kyi khams rnam par gzhag pa na sems kye khams bdun no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas Aha   zaw vijQAna DAtavaH ityAdi
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams drug po dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: cakzuH Adi sanniSritAH iti cakzuH Srotra GrANa rasana kAya manaH sanniSritAH
# rgya gar skad du: mig la sogs pa la brten te zhes bya ba ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid la brten te'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: rUpa Adi AlambanAH iti rUpa Sabda ganDa rasa sparSa Darma AlambanAH
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos rnams ni dmigs pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: vijQaptayaH iti vijQAnAni
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par rig pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra cakzuH ASrayam rUpa Alambanam cakzuH vijQAnam cakzuH vijQAna DAtuH
# rgya gar skad du: de la mig la brten cing gzugs la dmigs pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ste mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam Srotra GrANa rasana sparSana manaa ASrayANi Sabda ganDa rasa sparSa Darma AlambanAni yaTAkramam Srotra GrANa jihvA kAya manaH vijQAnAni Srot
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid la brten cing sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos rnams la go rims bzhin du dmigs pa ni rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te; rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: manaH DAtuH punar zaz vijQAna vyatiriktaH na vidyate
# rgya gar skad du: yid kyi khams ni rnam par shes pa drug las gud na med de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim tarhi te eva zaz vijQAna DAtavaH anantara nirudDAH manaH DAtuH iti ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par shes pa'i khams drug po de dag nyid 'gag sam thog pa la yid kyi khams zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: nanu evam saptadaSa DAtavaH prApnuvanti dvAdaSa vA manaH DAtoH zaNNAm ca vijQAna DAtUnAm itaretara antar BAvAt
# rgya gar skad du: de ltar na yid kyi khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams drug po dag gcig gi nang du gcig 'dus pa'i phyir khams bcu bdun nam bcu gnyis su mi 'gyur ram

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na prApnuvanti yasmAt zazWa vijQAna ASraya paridIpana arTam azwAdaSa DAtu vyavasTAnam
# rgya gar skad du: mi 'gyur te 'di ltar rnam par shes pa drug pa'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir de ltar khams bco brgyad du rnam par gzhag go

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: e[p. 119]vam iti anantara ukta prakAra pradarSanam
# rgya gar skad du: de ltar zhes bya ba ni gong du smos pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yaH rUpa skanDaH iti ekAdaSa dravyakaH hi rUpa skanDaH uktaH
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs kyi phung po gang yin pa zhes bya ba la rdzas bcu gcig ni gzugs kyi phung po bstan te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra paQca indriyANi cakzuH AdIni paQca vizayAH rUpa AdayaH Ayatana vyavasTAyAm daSa AyatanAni DAtu vyavasTAyAm daSa DAtavaH Darma Ayatana ek
# rgya gar skad du: de la mig la sogs pa dbang po lnga dang gzugs la sogs pa yul lnga ni skye mched rnam par gzhag par skye mched bcu dang; khams rnam par gzhag par khams bcu dang chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs gcig dang chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yaH vijQAna skanDaH sa manaA Ayatanam citta DAtavaH ca sapta cakzuH vijQAna DAtuH yAvat manaH vijQAna DAtuH iti
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par shes pa'i phung po gang yin pa de ni yid kyi skye mched dang sems kyi khams bdun no zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi khams kyi bar du'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ye anye rUpa skanDAt vijQAna skanDAt ca trayaH vedanA saQjQA saMskAra AKyAH skanDAH rUpa skanDa pradeSaH ca avijQapti AKyaH
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po las gzhan phung po gsum gang yin pa dag tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed ces bya ba'i phung po rnams so gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te Darma Ayatanam DarmaDAtuH ca saha asaMskRtena AkASa AdinA
# rgya gar skad du: de dag 'dus ma byas nam mkha' la sogs pa dang bcas pa ni chos kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kena arTena DAtavaH iti Ayatana arTa vat vistareNa vAcyam
# rgya gar skad du: ci'i phyir khams zhes bya zhe na zhes bya ba ni skye mched bzhin du rgya cher brjod par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: nirvyApAra sva lakzaNa DAraNa arTena iti
# rgya gar skad du: byed pa med la rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir khams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: nirvyApAram sva lakzaNam DArayanti iti DAtavaH na hi kzaNikAnAm vyApAraH samBavati iti pUrvam eva uktam
# rgya gar skad du: skad cig rnams la ni byed pa med par mi srid do zhes sngar bstan pa nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yaH eva DarmAH skanDAH iti deSitAH te eva punar Ayatana tvena DAtu tvena ca iti atas pRcCati   kimarTam skanDa Adi deSanA iti
# rgya gar skad du: chos gang dag phung po zhes bstan pa de dag nyid skye mched nyid dang khams nyid du yang bshad pas de'i phyir ci'i phyir phung po la sogs pa bshad ce na zhes dris so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sarvA hi deSanA BagavatAm budDAnAm sa prayojanA sattva arTa pravRtta tvAt kleSa pratipakzeNa ca
# rgya gar skad du: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bshad pa thams cad ni sems can gyi don du 'gyur ba dang nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yin pas dgos pa dang bcas pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ca atra prayojanam vijQAyate   punar punar tezAm eva DarmANAm anyena anyena ca prakAreNa deSanA iti kim arTam skanDa Adi deSanA iti p
# rgya gar skad du: 'dir ni chos de dag nyid rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis yang dang yang bshad pa'i dgos pa yang mi shes nas ci'i phyir phung po la sogs pa bshad ce na zhes bya ba ni dgos pa brjod do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: triviDa Atma grAha pratipakzeNa iti
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir bdag tu 'dzin pa rnam pa gsum gyi gnyen por zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: [p. 120] tatra navijQAyate katamaH triviDaH Atma grAhaH katamasya vA pratipakzeNa katamA deSanA iti atas Aha
# rgya gar skad du: de la bdag tu 'dzin pa gsum dang gang gi gnyen por bshad pa yang mi shes pas de'i phyir go rims bzhin no zhes bya ba smos te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yaTAkramam triviDaH Atma grAhaH ekatva grAhaH BoktRtva grAhaH kartR tva grAhaH ca
# rgya gar skad du: bdag tu 'dzin pa rnam pa gsum ni gcig pur 'dzin pa dang za bar 'dzin pa dang byed par 'dzin pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra yaTAkramam iti skanDa deSana ekatva grAha pratipakzeNa
# rgya gar skad du: de la go rims bzhin zhes bya ba la phung po bshad pa ni gcig pur 'dzin pa'i gnyen po'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Ayatana deSanA BokRtva grAha pratipakzeNa
# rgya gar skad du: skye mched bshad pa ni za bar 'dzin pa'i gnyen po'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DAtu deSanA kartR tva grAha pratipakzeNa iti
# rgya gar skad du: khams bshad pa ni byed par 'dzin pa'i gnyen po'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sarve hi Atma vAdinaH evam pratipannAH   yaH eva paSyati saH eva SRNoti jiGrati AsvAdayati spRSati ca iti tatra yaH eva vedayate saH ev
# rgya gar skad du: bdag tu smra ba thams cad ni mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid thos pa dang snom pa dang ro myong ba dang reg pa yin pa dang de la de nyid sems par byed ba dang 'du shes su byed pa dang rnam par shes par byed pa'o snyam du de ltar 'dzin to

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na hi sattva Atma BAvaH evam skanDa vyatiriktaH anyaH kaScid eka vyavasTita rUpaH vidyate
# rgya gar skad du: sems can rnams kyi lus la ni phung po lnga las gud na gcig pur rnam par gnas pa'i ngo bo gang yang med de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad svarUpa kArya anupalabDeH
# rgya gar skad du: rang gi ngo bo dang 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na cakzuH vyatirekeNa anyaH drazwA vidyate
# rgya gar skad du: mig las gud na lta ba po gzhan med de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: cakzuH eva hi darSana AKyasya vijQAnasya asADAraNam kAraNam ASrayaH ca iti drazwR tvena upacaryate
# rgya gar skad du: mig nyid mthong ba'o zhes rnam par shes pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu dang gnas yin pas lta ba po zhes gdags so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam pratyekam Srotra Adizu vaktavyam
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du rna ba la sogs pa so so la yang brjod par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam vedanA anuBava Atmaka tvAt vedayate
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du tshor ba ni myong ba'i bdag nyid yin pas myong bar byed

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: saQjQA eva nimitta udgrahaNa Atmika tvAt saQjAnIte na anyaH iti evam sarvatra vAcyam
# rgya gar skad du: 'du shes nyid mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid yin pas 'du shes su byed kyi gzhan ni ma yin te de ltar thams cad du yang brjod par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasmAt na Atma BAvaH sattvAnAm paQca skanDa Atmaka tvAt eka vastu AtmakaH
# rgya gar skad du: de lta bas na sems can rnams kyi lus ni phung po'i bdag nyid yin pas dngos po du ma'i bdag nyid can no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ca skanDa vyatiriktaH atra ekaH vidyate
# rgya gar skad du: 'di la ni phung po lnga las gud na gcig pu med de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ekatva grAhe vyAvartite skanDa deSanayA yaH tatra ekatva grAha pUrvakaH Atma grAhaH asO api vyAvartitaH eva iti atas eka tva grAha pUrva Atma gr
# rgya gar skad du: phung po bstan pas gcig pu 'dzin pa ldog pa na de la gcig pur 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bdag tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa de yang ldog pa nyid de de'i phyir gcig pur 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gnyen por phung po bshad do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: e[p. 121]ka tva grAhaH tu kAraNe kArya upacAram kRtvA Atma grAhaH iti uktaH
# rgya gar skad du: gcig pur 'dzin pa ni rgyu la 'bras bu btags nas bdag tu 'dzin pa zhes bya bar bshad do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: BoktR grAhaH punar sarva vAdinAm yaH SuBa aSuBasya karmaNaH izwa anizwam suKa duHKa vedanA praBAvitam Palam upaBuFkte rUpa Sabda AdIn ca vi
# rgya gar skad du: za bar 'dzin pa ni smra ba thams cad ci ltar na las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas rab tu phye ba dang gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa yul la gang sbyod pa de bdag go zhes so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: asya Atma grAhasya pratipakzeNa Ayatana deSanA
# rgya gar skad du: de ltar na bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di'i gnyen por skye mched bshad do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: SuBa aSuBa karma Palasya rUpa AdInAm ca vizayANAm upaBuktiH upalabDiH
# rgya gar skad du: las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu dang gzugs la sogs pa yul rnams la spyod pa ni dmigs pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tAm yaH karoti sa karma Palasya rUpa AdInAm ca upaBoktA
# rgya gar skad du: de byed pa gang yin pa de ni las kyi 'bras bu dang gzugs la sogs pa la spyod do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tAm zaz prakArAm upalabDim AyatanAni eva kurvanti na anyaH
# rgya gar skad du: dmigs pa rnam pa drug de yang skye mched nyid kyis byed kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas eva cakzuH AdayoH rUpa AdayaH ca vijQAnAya dvAra arTena AyatanAni iti ucyante
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir mig la sogs pa dang gzugs la sogs pa ni rnam par shes pa skye ba'i sgo'i phyir skye mched rnams zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasmAt na asti kaScid anyaH cakzuH Adi vyatirekeNa karma Palasya vizayANAm ca upaBoktA iti evam Ayatana deSanA BoktR tva grAha pratipakzeNet
# rgya gar skad du: de lta bas na las kyi 'bras bu dang yul rnams la spyod pa ni mig la sogs pa las gud na gzhan gang yang med de de ltar na skye mched bshad pa ni za bar 'dzin pa'i gnyen po zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kartR tva grAhaH punar yaH SuBa aSuBAnAm karmaNAm kartA valgana AsPowana AdInAm ca saH AtmA
# rgya gar skad du: byed par 'dzin pa ni las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams 'brel ba dang sprugs bsigs pa la sogs pa byed pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: asya Atma grAhasya pratipakzeNa DAtu deSanA
# rgya gar skad du: bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di'i gnyen por khams bshad do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: taTA hi nirvyApAra sva lakzaNa DAraNa arTena DAtavaH uktAH
# rgya gar skad du: de ltar na byed pa med la rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir khams zhes bstan to

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam kAraNam sattA mAtreNa kArya utpattim prati vyApriyate kAryam ca sattA mAtreNa eva kAraNam apekzate
# rgya gar skad du: de ltar rgyu yod pa tsam gyis 'bras bu yang 'byung bar byed cing 'bras bu yang rgyu la ltos nas yod pa tsam du zad de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ca kArya kAraNa svarUpa vyatirekeNa anyA kriyA asti tat pUrvam eva pratipAditam
# rgya gar skad du: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang gi ngo bo las ma gtogs par byed pa gzhan med par sngar bstan pa nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kriyAm antareNa ca kutas kartA
# rgya gar skad du: byed pa med par byed pa po ga la yod de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasmAt kartR tva grAha pratipakzeNa DAtu deSanA iti
# rgya gar skad du: de lta bas na byed par 'dzin pa'i gnyen por khams bshad pa yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: [p. 122] idAnIm Darma pravicaya anugraha arTam yaH eva skanDa Ayatana DAtu tvena DarmAH nirdizwAH tezAm eva prakArAH cintyante
# rgya gar skad du: de ni chos gang dag rab tu rnam par dbye bas phan gdags pa'i phyir phung po dang skye mched dang khams nyid du chos gang dag bstan pa de dag la rnam pa gzhan gyis bsam par bya ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra DAtuzu rUpa cittayoH viBakta tvena vistara apadeSAt sa Asrava prakAra AdInAm suKa gamyaH nirdeSaH iti DAtUn eva AraBya cintyate
# rgya gar skad du: de la khams rnams kyi nang du gzugs dang sems gnyis rnam par dbye ba lhag par bstan pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa bde blag tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir khams ga las brtsams te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na skanDa AyatanAn iti atas eva Aha   azwAdaSAnAm DAtUnAm kati rUpiNaH ityAdi
# rgya gar skad du: bsam par bya ba'i phung po dang skye mched rnams la ni ma yin no de'i phyir khams bco brgyad la gzugs can du zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: rUpaNam rUpam tat ezAm asti iti rUpiNaH
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs su yod pas gzugs te 'di dag la yod pas gzugs can no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ASraya ASritam rUpam vA yaTAsamBavam ezAm asti iti rUpiNaH
# rgya gar skad du: yang na rten dang brten pa'i gzugs ji ltar mthun mthun du 'di dag la yod pas gzugs can no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ca cakzuH Adi vijQAnezu prasaFgaH
# rgya gar skad du: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa la thal bar yang mi 'gyur te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: cakzuH AdInAm ADAra tvena tezAm anASraya tvAt
# rgya gar skad du: mig la sogs pa rten gyi dngos po de dag gi gzhi byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ye rUpa skanDa svaBAvAH iti te punar daSa DAtavaH
# rgya gar skad du: gang dag gzugs kyi phung po'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bya ba de dag ni khams bcu ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: cakzuH DAtuH yAvat kAyaDAtuH rUpa DAtuH yAvat sprazwavya DAtuH
# rgya gar skad du: mig gi khams nas lus kyi bar dang gzugs kyi khams nas reg bya'i khams kyi bar du'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: avijQapti rUpe sati api na DarmaDAtoH rUpi tva prasaFgaH tasya ASraya ASrita rUpa aBAvAt rUpaNa aBAvAt rUpa skanDa asaFgrahAt ca
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gzugs su yod du zin kyang chos kyi khams gzugs can nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur te de la rten dang brten pa'i gzugs med pa dang gzugs su yod pa med pa dang gzugs kyi phung por gtogs su zin kyang gzugs su yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati arUpiNaH
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs can ma yin pa du zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: SezAH  rUpi viparyayeNa ye
# rgya gar skad du: lhag ma rnams so zhes bya ba la gzugs can las ldog pa ni gzugs can ma yin pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te punar azwO   sapta citta DAtavaH DarmaDAtuH ca
# rgya gar skad du: de dag ni brgyad de sems kyi khams bdun dang chos kyi khams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati sa nidarSanAH iti azwAdaSAnAm DAtUnAm iti prakRta tvAt sambaDyate
# rgya gar skad du: bstan du yod pa du zhe na zhes bya ba ni khams bco brgyad kyi skabs yin pas der sbyar ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ekaH rUpa DAtuH iti idam iha amutra iti ayam eva vyapa[p. 123]deSaH nidarSanam
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs kyi khams gcig ste zhes bya ba la 'di ni 'di na'o zhes pha bi ni pha bi na'o zhes bstan du rung ba de ni bstan pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tena saha vartate iti sa nidarSanaH
# rgya gar skad du: de dang lhan cig pa ni bstan du yod pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sa Alambana vat
# rgya gar skad du: dmigs pa dang bcas pa bzhin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: idam eva nidarSana arTam praBAvayan Aha   deSa nidarSanena iti
# rgya gar skad du: bstan du yod pa 'di nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir yul bstan du yod pa'o zhes bya ba smos te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tasmin tasmin deSe nidarSyate anena iti deSa nidarSanam
# rgya gar skad du: yul de dang der 'dis bstan du yod pas yul bstan du yod pa'o zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ekasya eva rUpa DAtoH sa nidarSana tvena parigrahAt SezAH saptadaSa cakzuH Adi DAtavaH paQca Sabda Adi DAtavaH catvAraH DarmaDAtuH ekaH sa
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs kyi khams gcig kho na bstan du yod pa nyid du smos pas lhag ma khams bcu bdun ni bstan du med par grub bo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati sa pratiGAH azwAdaSAnAm DAtUnAm prakRta tvAt sarvatra sambaDyate
# rgya gar skad du: thogs pa dang bcas pa du zhen zhes bya ba ni khams bco brgyad kyi skabs yin pas thams cad du yang sbyar ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DarmaDAtO api avijQapti rUpa sadBAvAt asti rUpi vyapadeSaH iti daSa iti Aha arUpi vyavacCeda arTam rUpi grahaNam
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs can ma yin pa rnam par gcad pa'i phyir gzugs can smos so chos kyi khams la yang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs yod pas gzugs can yod par bstan pa'i phyir bcu zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te punar cakzuH Adi indriya DAtavaH paQca tad vizayAH rUpa Adi DAtavaH ca paQca
# rgya gar skad du: de dag kyang mig la sogs pa dbang po'i khams rnams dang de dag gi yul gzugs can gyi khams lnga'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pratiGAtaH pratiGaH
# rgya gar skad du: go gcod pas thogs pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tena saha vartante iti sa pratiGAH
# rgya gar skad du: de dang lhan cig pa ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: pratiGAtaH tri prakAraH vizaya Alambana AvaraNa pratiGAta BedAt
# rgya gar skad du: go gcod pa ni yul dang dmigs pa dang sgrib pas go gcod pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: iha tu AvaraNa pratiGAtena eva sa pratiGa tvam izwam iti pratipAdayan Aha   yatra yaH ca pratihanyate iti
# rgya gar skad du: 'dir ni sgrib pa'i go gcod pa nyid thogs pa dang bcas par 'dod pa bstan pa'i phyir gang la gang thogs pa'o zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AvaraNa pratiGAtaH hi sva deSe parasya utpatti pratibanDaH
# rgya gar skad du: sgrib pa'i go gcod pa ni rang gi yul du gzhan 'byung ba'i gegs su gyur pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam ca yena anyasya sva deSaH utpattiH pratibaDyate yasya ca pratibaDyate tad uBa[p. 124]yam api sa pratiGam iti jQApitam Bavati
# rgya gar skad du: de ltar na gang gis rang gi yul du gzhan 'byung ba'i gegs byed pa dang gang la gegs byed pa de gnyi ga yang thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes bstan pa yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: etena ca daSa rUpiNaH DAtavaH parasparasya sva deSaH utpattim pratibaDnanti iti AvaraNa pratiGAtena sa pratiGAH
# rgya gar skad du: khams gzugs can bcu po de dag kyang rang rang gi yul du 'byung ba la gcig la gcig gegs byed pas sgrib cing go gcod pa'i phyir thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: SezAH sapta citta DAtavaH DarmaDAtuH ca apratiGAH iti sidDam
# rgya gar skad du: lhag ma sems kyi khams bdun dang chos kyi khams ni thogs pa med par grub po zag pa dang bcas pa du zhe na zhes bya ba ni khams kyi skabs yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati sa AsravAH DAtUnAm iti prakRtam paQcadaSa trayANAm ca paScimAnAm BAgaH iti cakzuH AdayaH paQca indriya DAtavaH rUpa AdayaH paQca viz
# rgya gar skad du: bco lnga dang tha ma gsum gyi cha ste zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa dbang po lnga'i khams dang gzugs la sogs pa yul lnga'i khams dang mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga ste khams bco lnga po dag ni gcig tu zag pa dang bcas pa nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AdyAH api trayaH vidyante cakzU rUpa cakzuH vijQAna DAtavaH iti atas Aha   paScimAnAm iti
# rgya gar skad du: dang po la yang gsum yod de mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin pas de'i phyir tha ma zhes smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: paScimAH trayaH manaH DAtuH DarmaDAtuH manaH vijQAna DAtuH ca
# rgya gar skad du: tha ma gsum ni yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tezAm api BAgaH aMSaH sa AsravaH
# rgya gar skad du: de dag gi cha ni cha shas te zag pa dang bcas pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na tu cakzuH Adi vat sarve eva sa AsravAH
# rgya gar skad du: mig la sogs pa bzhin du thams cad zag pa dang bcas pa nyid ni ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tezAm punar yaH na mArga satya asaMskRta svaBAvaH BAgaH saH eva sa AsravaH
# rgya gar skad du: de dag las kyang lam gyi bden pa dang 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin gyi cha ma yin pa de nyid zag pa dang bcas pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sa AsravEH saha vartante iti sa AsravAH
# rgya gar skad du: zag pa dang lhan cig pas zag pa dang bcas pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas eva Aha   tezu kleSa utpattitaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir de dag nyon mongs pa skye ba zhes bya ba smos te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tezu yasmAt kleSAH utpadyante te sa AsravAH iti
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ltar de dag las nyon mongs pa skye bas de'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: cakzuH Adi vijQAnAnAm avikalpaka tvAt kaTam rUpa Adizu kleSa utpattiH
# rgya gar skad du: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams ni rnam par mi rtog pa yin pas ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa rnams la nyon mongs pa skyed ce na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ucyate cakzuH Adi vijQAnEH eva saha rUpa Adizu kleSAH utpadyante iti
# rgya gar skad du: nyon mongs pa rnams mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams dang lhan cig tu gzugs la sogs pa la 'byung ba zhes mi bya mod kyi

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim tarhi pratyakza gocara tAm upAdAya [p. 125] rUpa Adizu kleSa utpattiH ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: 'on kyang mngon sum gyi spyod yul gyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pas nyon mongs la skyed pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: taTA hi cakzuH ca pratItya rUpANi ca pratItya cakzuH vijQAnam utpadyate
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ltar mig la brten cing gzugs la sogs pa la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: cakzuH vijQAna anuBUtAni rUpANi manaH vijQAnena vikalpyante vikalpAt ca kleSAH utpadyante iti
# rgya gar skad du: mig gi rnam par shes pas myong ba'i gzugs rnams la yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rtog par byed pas rnam par rtog pa las nyon mongs pa 'byung ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam Sezezu api vAcyam
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la yang brjod par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati anAsravAH trayANAm paScimAnAm BAgaH
# rgya gar skad du: zag pa med pa du zhe na tha ma gsum gyi cha'o zhes bya ba ni

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: manaH Darma manaH vijQAna DAtUnAm yaH mArga satya asaMskRta saFgRhItaH pradeSaH saH anAsravaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams kyi'o lam gyi bden pa dang 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa'i phyogs gang yin pa de ni zag pa med pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati kAma pratisaMyuktAH azwAdaSAnAm DAtUnAm iti sambaDyate
# rgya gar skad du: 'dod pa dang ldan pa du zhe na zhes bya ba ni khams bco brgyad ces bya ba dang sbyar te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: paQca rUpa AdayaH vizayAH kAmyante iti kAmAH
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs la sogs pa yul lnga ni 'dod par bya ba yin pas 'dod pa rnams te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tad praDAnaH DAtuH kAmaDAtuH tad pratisaMyuktAH kAma pratisaMyuktAH iti ucyante
# rgya gar skad du: de gces su byed pa'i khams rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: aTavA kAmaDAtu pratisaMyuktAH iti vaktavye DAtu Sabda lopAt kAma pratisaMyuktAH iti uktAH
# rgya gar skad du: yang na 'dod pa'i khams dang ldan pa du zhe na zhes brjod pa'i rigs pa las khams zhes bya ba'i sgra ma smos pa 'dod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kAma pratisaMyuktAH kAmaDAtu saFgRhItAH kAmaDAtu svaBAvAH iti arTaH
# rgya gar skad du: 'dod pa'i khams dang ldan pa dag ni 'dod pa'i khams kyis bsdus pa rnams te 'dod pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: taTA yatra kAma tRzNA samudAcAraH tat sarvam kAmaDAtu saFgRhItam
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ltar gang du 'dod pa'i sred pa kun du 'byung ba thams cad 'dod pa'i khams su bsdus pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te punar sarve   zaw indriya DAtavaH zaw vizaya DAtavaH zaw vijQAna DAtavaH ca
# rgya gar skad du: de dag kyang dbang po'i khams drug dang yul gyi khams drug dang rnam par shes pa'i khams drug go

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati rUpa pratisaMyuktAH caturdaSa
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs dang ldan pa du zhe na bcu bzhi ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra zaw cakzuH Srotra GrANa jihvA kAyamanA Endriya DAtavaH
# rgya gar skad du: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang; lce dang lus dang yid kyi dbang po'i khams dang yul bzhi dang yul de'i rnam par shes pa'i khams bzhi ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: catvAraH vizaya DAtavaH tad vizaya vijQAna [p. 126]DAtavaH catvAraH   ete caturdaSa rUpa DAtu pratisaMyuktAH
# rgya gar skad du: bcu bzhi po de dag ni gzugs kyi khams dang ldan pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim punar kAraNam ganDa rasayaH rUpa DAtO na BAvaH tad vijQAnayoH ca
# rgya gar skad du: ci'i phyir gzugs kyi khams na dri dang ro dang de'i rnam par shes pa gnyis kyang med ce na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ganDarasO hi ekAntena kavaxIkAra AhAra svaBAvO eva na tu sparSa vedanA AhAra svaBAvO
# rgya gar skad du: dri dang ro ni gcig tu kham gyi zas kyi ngo bo nyid yin gyi reg pa dang sems pa'i zas kyi ngo bo nyid ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: api ca kavaxIkAra AhAra vIta rAgAH ca rUpa DAtO upapadyante
# rgya gar skad du: yang kham gyi zas kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams ni gzugs kyi khams su skye ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yad vIta rAgAH ca yatra upapadyante tatra tasya aBAvaH
# rgya gar skad du: gang gi 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams gang du skyes pa de na med de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat yaTA rUpa vIta rAgANAm ArUpya ApattO cakzuH AdInAm vizaya aBAvAt ca ganDa rasa vijQAnayoH api aBAvaH
# rgya gar skad du: dper na 'dod chags dang bral ba gzugs med par skyes pa'i mig la sogs pa bzhin du yul med pa'i phyir dri dang ro'i rnam par shes pa gnyis kyang med do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati ArUpya pratisaMyuktAH paScimAH trayaH
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs med pa dang ldan pa du zhe na tha ma gsum zhes bya ba ni

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: manaH DAtuH DarmaDAtuH manaH vijQAna DAtuH ca
# rgya gar skad du: yid kyi khams dang; chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: rUpa vIta rAgAH hi ArUpya DAtO utpadyante
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams ni gzugs med pa'i khams su skye ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas tatra daSa rUpa svaBAvAH DAtavaH tad ASraya AlambanAH ca paQca vijQAna DAtavaH na santi
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir de na gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi khams bcu dang de la brten pa dang dmigs pa rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga med do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati apratisaMyuktAH ye anAsravAH ye kAmarUpa ArUpya tRzNABiH na Alambyante
# rgya gar skad du: mi ldan pa du zhe na gsum gyi cha'o zhes bya ba ni gang dag 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i sred pa rnams kyis ma dmigs pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DAtu traya viyukta tvAt apratisaMyuktAH
# rgya gar skad du: khams gsum dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir mi ldan pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ye mArga satya asaMskRta svaBAvAH manaH Darma manaH vijQAna DAtavaH te anAsravAH
# rgya gar skad du: lam gyi bden pa dang 'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa'i yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams de dag ni zag pa med pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati kuSalAH
# rgya gar skad du: dge ba du

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati akuSalAH
# rgya gar skad du: mi dge ba du

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati avyAkRtAH
# rgya gar skad du: lung du ma bstan pa du zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: azwa a[p. 127]daSAnAm DAtUnAm iti prakRta tvAt sambaDyate
# rgya gar skad du: khams bco brgyad kyi skabs yin pas der sbyar ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra kutsitAt Salitam iti kuSalam
# rgya gar skad du: de la ngan pa bsnyil ba'i phyir dge ba ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: gatam iti arTaH
# rgya gar skad du: song zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kuSa iti vA prajQAparyAyaH
# rgya gar skad du: yang na ku sha ni shes rab kyi rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: lAH AdAne
# rgya gar skad du: la ni len pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: prajQA parigRhItAH prajQA parigrAhakAH vA kuSalAH
# rgya gar skad du: shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa'am shes rab yongs su 'dzin pa ni dge ba rnams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kutsitena vA AkAreNa SerataH iti kuSAH
# rgya gar skad du: yang na ngan pa'i rnam par 'dug pa ni rtsva ku sha ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: CedakAH veDakAH ca iti
# rgya gar skad du: gcod pa dang 'bigs pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: lAH AdAne
# rgya gar skad du: la ni len pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yaH Cedana veDana parihAreNa kuSAn Adatte sa kuSalaH iti ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: su zhig gcod pa dang 'bigs pa spangs te rtsva ku sha rnams len pa de ni mkhas pa zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam anyaH api yasyAm kriyAyAm praSaMsAm arhati sa kuSalaH tatra ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du gzhan bya ba gang la bsngags par 'os pa de ni dge ba zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: etena akuSalam vyAKyAtam
# rgya gar skad du: 'dis mi dge ba bzlog ste bshad do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kuSala akuSala BAvena avyAkaraNAt avyAkRtAH
# rgya gar skad du: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dngos por lung du bstan pa med pas ma bstan pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: daSa triviDA  iti   kuSalAH api akuSalAH api avyAkRtAH api
# rgya gar skad du: bcu ni rnam pa gsum char te zhes bya ba ni dge ba yang yin mi dge ba yang yin lung du ma bstan pa yang yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te tu na vijQAyanta azwAdaSAnAm DAtUnAm katame daSa iti Aha   sapta citta DAtavoH rUpa Sabda Darma DAtavaH ca iti
# rgya gar skad du: khams pa co brgyad kyi nang nas bcu gang zhes bya ba de dag kyang mi shes nas sems kyi khams bdun dang gzugs dang sgra dang chos kyi khams so zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atra citta DAtUnAm samprayogataH kuSala akuSala tvam
# rgya gar skad du: de la sems kyi khams rnams ni mtshungs par ldan pas dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid yin gyi

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na svatas
# rgya gar skad du: ngo bo nyid kyi ni ma yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kuSala akuSala mUlAnAm ca iti
# rgya gar skad du: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang mtshungs par ldan pas so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra sapta citta DAtavaH aloBAt vezA moha samprayuktAH kuSalAH
# rgya gar skad du: de la sems kyi khams bdun ma chags pa dang zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams ni dge ba'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: loBa dveza moha samprayuktAH akuSalAH
# rgya gar skad du: chags pa dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams ni mi dge ba'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: anye avyAkRtAH
# rgya gar skad du: gzhan dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: rUpa Sabda DAtU kuSala akuSala citta samutTApitO kuSala akuSalO kAya vAc vijQapti saFgRhItO
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs dang sgra'i khams lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed du bsdus pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems kyis kun nas bslang ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas anyO avyAkRtO
# rgya gar skad du: de las gzhan pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DarmaDAtuH aloBa Adi svaBAva samprayukta samutTaH pratisaFKyA niroDaH taTatA ca kuSalaH
# rgya gar skad du: chos kyi khams kyang ma chags pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas bslang ba dang so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang de bzhin nyid ni dge ba'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: loBa Adi svaBAva samprayukta samutTaH akuSalaH
# rgya gar skad du: chags pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas bslang ba ni mi dge ba'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatas [p. 128] anyaH avyAkRtaH
# rgya gar skad du: de las gzhan pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'o;

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: azwO avyAkRtAH
# rgya gar skad du: brgyad ni lung du ma bstan pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ganDa rasa sparSAH paQca cakzuH AdayaH
# rgya gar skad du: dre dang ro dang reg bya dang mig la sogs pa lnga'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ete hi avyAkRtAH eva parama arTa svaBAva samprayoga samutTAnataH kuSala akuSala tva aBAvAt
# rgya gar skad du: de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa nyid de don dam pa dang ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas bslang bas dge ba dang mi dge ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati ADyAtmikAH azwAdaSAnAm DAtUnAm iti sambaDyate
# rgya gar skad du: nang gi du zhe na; khams bco brgyad ces bya bar sbyar ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: dvAdaSa te tu na prajQAyante katamet vAdaSa iti Aha
# rgya gar skad du: bcu gnyis te bcu gnyis gang yin pa de dag kyang mi shes pas

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: rUpa Sabda ganDa rasa sprazwavya Darma DAtUn sTApayitvA iti
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos kyi khams ma gtogs so zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: SezAH zaw indriya DAtavaH zaw vijQAna DAtavaH iti ete dvAdaSa ADyAtmikAH
# rgya gar skad du: lhag ma dbang po'i khams drug dang rnam par shes pa'i khams drug ste bcu gnyis po de dag ni nang gi'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati DAtavaH bAhyAH zax
# rgya gar skad du: khams rnams las phyi rol gyi du zhe na drug ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te tu na vijQAyante iti atas Aha   ye sTApitAH
# rgya gar skad du: de dag kyang mi shes nas de'i phyir gang dag ma gtogs pa rnams so zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ete bAhyAH iti bodDavyAH
# rgya gar skad du: 'di dag ni phyi'i yin par shes par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ke ca sTApitAH
# rgya gar skad du: ma gtogs pa rnams gang zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: rUpa Sabda ganDa rasa sprazwavya Darma DAtavaH
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos kyi khams rnams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: aDi AtmAnam aDyAtmam
# rgya gar skad du: bdag gi dbang du byas pa ni nang zhes bya ba ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: aDyAtmam eva ADyAtmikam
# rgya gar skad du: nang nyid nang ngo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: Atmani asati kaTam ADyAtmikam bAhyam vA Bavati
# rgya gar skad du: bdag nyid med na nang ngam phyi zhes bya bar ji ltar 'gyur te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na hi SIle asati aDiSIlam SikzA yujyate
# rgya gar skad du: tshul khrims med na tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas pa'i bslab pa mi rung ba bzhin no zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ahaFkAra sanniSrita tvAt cittam AtmA iti upacaryate
# rgya gar skad du: ngar 'dzin pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir sems la bdag ces 'dogs so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ahaFkAra sanniSrayaH hi Atma vAdiBiH AtmA iti aBiDIyate
# rgya gar skad du: ngar 'dzin pa'i gzhi ni bdag tu smra ba rnams kyis bdag ces brjod de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: taTA hi Atma guNa tvena Atma vizaya tvena ca ahaFkAram pratipannAH
# rgya gar skad du: 'di ltar bdag gi yon tan nam bdag yul nyid du ngar 'dzin pa rtogs so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ahaFkAraH ca citta sanniSritaH tad vyatirikta Atma aBAvAt
# rgya gar skad du: ngar 'dzin pa yang sems la brten pa ste de las gud na bdag med pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AhitaH ahaMmAnaH etasmin iti AtmA
# rgya gar skad du: de la nga'o snyam du nga rgyal skyed pas bdag ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: cittam eva cEttAnAm ASrayaH iti cittam eva Atma tvena upacaryate
# rgya gar skad du: sems nyid sems las byung ba rnams kyi gnas yin pas sems nyid la bdag tu 'dogs so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kaTam [p. 129] punar etat gamyate atra Atma tvena cittam aBipretam iti
# rgya gar skad du: 'dir sems la bdag ces bya bar bzhed par 'di ci mngon zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: uktam hi BagavatA
# rgya gar skad du: bcom ldan 'das kyis

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: AtmanA hi su dAntena svargam prApnoti paNxitaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: bdag ni legs par dul gyur na mkhas pas mtho ris thob par 'gyur zhes gsungs so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: cittasya ca anyatra damanam uktam   cittasya damanam sADu cittam dAntam suKa Avaham iti
# rgya gar skad du: gzhan nas kyang sems 'dul ba gsungs te sems 'dul ba ni legs pa ste sems 'dul bde ba thob par byed ce'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atra hi cittasya damanam cittam eva dAntam suKa Avaham iti uktam
# rgya gar skad du: 'dir sems 'dul ba dang sems nyid dul na bde ba thob par byed ces gsungs pas de'i phyir

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas atra api AtmanA hi su dAntena svargam prApnoti paNxitaH iti cittam eva aBipretam iti vijQAyate
# rgya gar skad du: bdag ni legs par dul gyur na mkhas pas mtho ris thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'dir yang sems nyid la bya bar bzhed par mngon no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas ca Atma BUtasya cittasya ASraya BAvena pratyAsanna tvAt cakzuH AdInAm ADyAtmika tvam
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir bdag tu lta ba'i sems kyi rten gyi dngos por nye bar gyur pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa ni nang gi nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: rUpa AdInAm ca vizaya BAvAt bAhya tvam
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi dngos por gyur pa ni phyi'i nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam tarhi zaw vijQAna DAtavaH ADyAtmikAH na prApnuvanti
# rgya gar skad du: de ltar na ni rnam par shes pa'i khams drug nang gir mi 'gyur te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na hi ete manaH DAtu tvam aprAptAH cittasya ASrayIBavanti iti
# rgya gar skad du: de dag yid kyi khams nyid du ma gyur gyi bar du sems kyi rten du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yadA tadA te eva te Bavanti iti lakzaNam na ativartante iti
# rgya gar skad du: nam du yang rung ste de dag nyid nad yin pas mtshan nyid las 'da' ba med do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati sa AlambanA DAtavaH iti prakRtam atas Aha   sapta iti
# rgya gar skad du: dmigs pa dang bcas pa du zhe na zhes bya ba ni khams kyi skabs yin pas de'i phyir bdun zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te api na jQAyante katame sapta iti atas Aha   citta DAtavaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: bdun po de dag kyang gang yin mi shes pas de'i phyir sems kyi khams zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim ete eva sa AlambanAH
# rgya gar skad du: dmigs pa dang bcas pa 'di dag nyid du zad dam zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na
# rgya gar skad du: ma yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim tarhi DarmaDAtu pradeSaH ca
# rgya gar skad du: chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig kyang yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: caSabdaH samuccaye
# rgya gar skad du: kyang gi sgra ni bsdu'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sapta citta DAtavaH DarmaDAtu pradeSaH ca sa AlambanaH iti
# rgya gar skad du: sems kyi khams bdun dang chos kyi khams kyi gcig kyang dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: asti amIzAm Alambanam iti sa AlambanAH
# rgya gar skad du: 'di dag la dmigs pa yod pas dmigs pa dang bcas pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: vizayaH gocaraH Alambanam iti paryAyAH
# rgya gar skad du: yul dang spyod yul dang dmigs pa zhes bya ba rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sapta citta DAtavaH cakzuH Srotra GrANa rasa nakAya[p. 130] manaH vijQAna manaH DAtavaH DarmaDAtu pradeSaH ca yaH cEtasika svaBAvaH
# rgya gar skad du: sems kyi khams bdun ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams so chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig ni gang sems las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati anAlambanAH
# rgya gar skad du: dmigs pa med pa du zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: SezAH
# rgya gar skad du: lhag ma rnams te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te punar daSa
# rgya gar skad du: de dag kyang bcu ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: paQca indriya DAtavaH cakzuH AdayaH paQca vizaya DAtavaH rUpa AdayaH
# rgya gar skad du: mig la sogs pa dbang po'i khams lnga dang gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi khams lnga'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DarmaDAtu pradeSaH ca yaH na cEtasika svaBAvaH
# rgya gar skad du: chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gang sems las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati vikalpakAH
# rgya gar skad du: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa du zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: azwAdaSAnAm DAtUnAm iti sambaDyate
# rgya gar skad du: khams bco brgyad ces bya bar sbyar ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: manaH DAtuH manaH vijQAna DAtuH DarmaDAtoH ca pradeSaH yaH samprayuktaH
# rgya gar skad du: yid kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang; chos kyi khams kyi phyogs so zhes bya ba ni gang mtshungs par ldan pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: etO hi aBinirUpaNa anusmaraNa vikalpAByAm samprayuktO
# rgya gar skad du: 'di gnyis ni mngon par dpyod pa dang rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tO eva vikalpakO na itarO
# rgya gar skad du: de nyid rnam par rtog pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tAByAm asamprayogAt
# rgya gar skad du: de gnyis dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DarmaDAtu pradeSaH api samprayuktaH
# rgya gar skad du: chos kyi khams kyi phyogs ni mtshungs par ldan pa can te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na itaraH
# rgya gar skad du: gzhan ni ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra anusmaraNa vikalpaH smRtiH eva mAnasI anuBUta AlambanA sampramoza AkArA
# rgya gar skad du: de la rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni dran pa nyid la bya ste yid kyi myong ba'i dmigs pa ma brjed pa rnams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: trEyaDvika paraH kzArTa aByUhana AkAraH idam evam na evam iti prajQA viSezaH cetanA vA aBirUpaNa avikalpaH
# rgya gar skad du: dus gsum gyi don lkog tu gyur pa la mngon par dpyod pa'i rnam pa 'di ni 'di lta yin gyi de lta ma yin no zhes bya ba shes rab kyi khyad par la'am sems pa ni mngon par dpyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yaTA uktam aBiDarma samuccaye   anusmaraNa vikalpaH katamaH
# rgya gar skad du: chos mngon pa kun las btus pa las ji skad du rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yaH anuBUta pUrva saMskAra AkAraH
# rgya gar skad du: gang sngon myong ba la 'du byed bskyed pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: aBinirUpaNa avikalpaH katamaH
# rgya gar skad du: mngon par dpyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yaH atIta anAgata vartamAnezu viparokzezu aByUhana AkAraH vikalpaH
# rgya gar skad du: gang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi don lkog tu gyur pa rnams la mngon par dpyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o zhes bshad pa lta bu'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: [p. 131] SezAH avikalpakAH iti sidDam
# rgya gar skad du: lhag ma rnams ni rnam par mi rtog par 'grub ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te punar paQcadaSa DAtavaH
# rgya gar skad du: de dag kyang khams bco lnga ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: DarmaDAtoH ca pradeSaH
# rgya gar skad du: chos kyi khams kyi phyogs te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ete hi avikalpakAH eva
# rgya gar skad du: de dag ni rnam par mi rtog pa nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: azwAdaSAnAm DAtUnAm kati upAttAH
# rgya gar skad du: khams bco brgyad las zin pa du zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: paQca ADyAtmikAH
# rgya gar skad du: nang gi lnga ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te punar cakzuH Srotra GrANa rasana kAya DAtavaH
# rgya gar skad du: de dag ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi khams te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ete hi upAttAH eva
# rgya gar skad du: de dag ni zin pa nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: nanu ca anyatra ete dviDA nirdizwAH
# rgya gar skad du: gzhan las 'di dag gnyis su ma bstan tam

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: satyam nirdizwAH tatra hya tIta an AgatAH anupAttAH uktAH
# rgya gar skad du: bstan mod kyi de la yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni zin pa ma yin par brjod de

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te ca na santi eva
# rgya gar skad du: de ni med pa nyid do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ca asataH upAtta tvam anupAtta tvam vA yujyate
# rgya gar skad du: med pa ni zin pa'am ma zin pa yin par brjod du mi rung ngo

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: vartamAnAH tu sva satta aDya asita tvAt citta cEttEH ca upAtta tvAt upAttAH eva cakzuH AdayaH na anupAttAH
# rgya gar skad du: da ltar ni rang yod par gnas pa dang sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyis zin pa'i phyir zin pa nyid de mig la sogs pa ni ma zin pa ma yin no

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim cakzuH AdayaH eva paQca upAttAH
# rgya gar skad du: ci mig la sogs pa lnga po nyid zin pa dag gang zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na
# rgya gar skad du: ma yin te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kim tarhi caturNAm ca pradeSaH
# rgya gar skad du: bzhi'i phyogs te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: katam ezAm caturNAm iti atra Aha   rUpa rasa ganDa sprazwavyAnAm iti
# rgya gar skad du: bzhi po de dag gang yin snyam pa la de'i phyir gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra ye rUpa ganDa rasa sprazwavya DAtavaH indriya avinirBAga vartinaH te indriya vat upAttAH
# rgya gar skad du: de la gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams dbang po las tha dad du mi 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag dbang po dag bzhin du zin pa rnams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: anye anupAttAH
# rgya gar skad du: gzhan dag ni ma zin pa dag ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tat yaTA mUla varjyezu keSa roma naKa dantezu viz mUtra Kewa siFGANaka SoNita Adizu BUmi udaka Adizu ca
# rgya gar skad du: 'di lta ste drung ma gtogs pa'i skra dang spu dang sen mo dang so dang phyi sa dang gcin dang mchil ma dang snabs dang khrag la sogs pa dang sa dang chu la sogs pa rnams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: upAttam iti kaH arTaH
# rgya gar skad du: zin pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: yat citta cEttEH aDizWAna BAvena upagRhItam anugraha upaGAtAByAm anyonya anuviDAnAt yat loke sa cetanam iti ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: phan pa dang gnod pa gnyis kyis phan tshun rjes su 'gyur ba'i phyir gang sems dang sems las byung ba de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas kyi dngos por zin pa dang 'jig rten na sems bcas pa zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati anupAttAH
# rgya gar skad du: zin pa ma yin pa du zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: SezAH nava caturNAm ca pradeSaH upayukteByaH [p. 132] ye anye te SezAH
# rgya gar skad du: lhag ma dgu dang bzhi'i phyogs zhes bya ba ni bshad zin pa rnams las gzhan gang yin pa de dag lhag ma'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: atas sapta citta DAtavaH DarmaDAtuH SabdaDAtuH ca
# rgya gar skad du: de'i phyir sems kyi khams bdun dang chos kyi khams dang sgra'i khams so;

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: caturNAm ca pradeSaH iti rUpa ganDa rasa sparSAnAm
# rgya gar skad du: bzhi'i phyogs zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg pa rnams kyi'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sa punar yaH indriya avinirBAga vartinam BAgam sTApayitvA mUla varjyezu keSa roma Adizu vartate
# rgya gar skad du: de yang dbang po dang tha dad du mi 'jug pa'i cha ma gtogs pa dang drung ma gtogs pa'i skra dang spu la sogs pa yod pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kati sa BAgAH
# rgya gar skad du: sten pa mtshungs pa du zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: azwAdaSAnAm DAtUnAm iti prakRta tvAt aBisambaDyate
# rgya gar skad du: khams bco brgyad kyi skabs yin pas der sbyar ro

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te paQca ADyAtmikAH iti dvAdaSa ADyAtmikAH uktAH tezAm na vijQAyate katame paQca iti atas Aha
# rgya gar skad du: nang gi gzugs can lnga zhes bya ba ni nang gi bcu gnyis bstan pas de dag gi nang na gang yin pa gtol med pas lnga zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: rUpiNaH iti te punar cakzuH Srotra GrANa rasana sparSana DAtavaH
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs can zhes bya ba de dag ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi khams so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kasya sa BAgAH kena prakAreNa saBAgAH iti na vijQAyate atas Aha
# rgya gar skad du: gang gi sten pa mtshungs pa dang rnam pa gang gis sten pa mtshungs pa yang mi shes pas de'i phyir

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sva vijQAnEH vizaya sAmAnya tAm upAdAya iti
# rgya gar skad du: rang gi rnam par shes pa dag dang yul thun mong ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tatra cakzuzaH sva vijQAnam cakzuH vijQAnam
# rgya gar skad du: de la mig gi rang gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: tena sva vijQAnena cakzuH sva vizayeNa rUpeNa samAnam
# rgya gar skad du: rang gi rnam par shes pa de dang mig rang gi yul gzugs su mtshungs te

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: dvayoH api cakzuH vijQAna utpattO anuguNa tvAt samAnam
# rgya gar skad du: gnyi ga yang mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba dang mthun pa'i phyir mtshungs pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sAmAnya tAm upAdAya iti gRhItvA cakzuH sva vizayeNa rUpeNa sa BAgam ucyate
# rgya gar skad du: thun mong pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bzung ba ste mig gi rang gi yul gzugs dang sten pa mtshungs pa zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: evam Srotra AdInAm api sva vizayEH saBA gatA vaktavyA
# rgya gar skad du: de bzhin du rna ba la sogs pa yang rang gi yul rnams dang sten pa mtshungs pa zhes brjod par bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: etat uktam Bavati
# rgya gar skad du: de ni 'di skad du

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ye cakzuH AdayaH sva vijQAnEH aDyAsitAH
# rgya gar skad du: mig la sogs pa gang dag rang gi rnam par shes pa rnams dang gnas pa de dag sten pa mtshungs pa zhes bstan par 'gyur ro;

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te sa BAgAH
# rgya gar skad du: de dag dang mtshungs pa du zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te eva cakzuH AdayaH sva vijQAna SUnyAH tad sa BAgAH
# rgya gar skad du: mig la sogs pa de dag nyid rang gi rnam par shes pas stong pa nyid de de dag dang mtshungs pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: kimarTam punar te tad sa BAgAH iti ucyante
# rgya gar skad du: ci'i phyir de dag ni de dag dang mtshungs pa zhes bya zhe na

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sva jAti sAmAnya tAm upAdA[p. 133]yA iti
# rgya gar skad du: rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: sva vijQAna SUnyAH cakzuH AdayaH te sa BAgAnAm cakzuH AdInAm cakzuH Adi jAtyA samAnAH iti tEH sadRSa tvAt tad saBAgAH iti ucyante
# rgya gar skad du: rang gi rnam par shes pa stong pa'i mig la sogs pa de dag ni sten pa mtshungs pa'i mig la sogs pa dang mig la sogs par ris mthun pa ste de dag dang 'dra ba'i phyir de dag dang mtshungs pa zhes bya'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: ete hi asADAraNa tvAt yaH ekasya saBAgAH tad saBAgA vA
# rgya gar skad du: de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir gcig gi sten pa mtshungs pa dang de dag dang mtshungs pa gang yin pa de dag ni

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: te sarva sattvAnAm api iti niyatam ezAm saBAga tat sa BAga tvam
# rgya gar skad du: sems can thams cad kyi yang yin pas 'di dag gi sten pa mtshungs pa dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni nges pa'o

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: rUpa AdInAm tu pratisantAne saBAga tad sa BAga tvam iti anavasTitam
# rgya gar skad du: gzugs la sogs pa ni so so'i rgyud la sten pa mtshungs pa dang de dag dang mtshungs pa nyid du gnas so rnam par shes pa las byed pa gzhan med pa'i phyir

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: na ca vijQAnAt anyat kAritram asti iti na anyezAm saBAga tad sa BAga tvam uktam
# rgya gar skad du: gzhan dag la ni sten pa mtshungs pa de dang de dag dang mtshungs pa zhes ma brjod do

paQca skanDaka viBAzA: paQca skanDaka viBAzA samAptA
# rgya gar skad du: phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa bye brag tu bshad pa
